00041 var Class = {
00042   create: function() {
00043     var parent = null, properties = $A(arguments);
00044     if (Object.isFunction(properties[0]))
00045       parent = properties.shift();
00046 
00047     function klass() {
00048       this.initialize.apply(this, arguments);
00049     }
00050 
00051     Object.extend(klass, Class.Methods);
00052     klass.superclass = parent;
00053     klass.subclasses = [];
00054 
00055     if (parent) {
00056       var subclass = function() { };
00057       subclass.prototype = parent.prototype;
00058       klass.prototype = new subclass;
00059       parent.subclasses.push(klass);
00060     }
00061 
00062     for (var i = 0; i < properties.length; i++)
00063       klass.addMethods(properties[i]);
00064 
00065     if (!klass.prototype.initialize)
00066       klass.prototype.initialize = Prototype.emptyFunction;
00067 
00068     klass.prototype.constructor = klass;
00069 
00070     return klass;
00071   }
00072 };

00074 Class.Methods = {
00075   addMethods: function(source) {
00076     var ancestor   = this.superclass && this.superclass.prototype;
00077     var properties = Object.keys(source);
00078 
00079     if (!Object.keys({ toString: true }).length)
00080       properties.push("toString", "valueOf");
00081 
00082     for (var i = 0, length = properties.length; i < length; i++) {
00083       var property = properties[i], value = source[property];
00084       if (ancestor && Object.isFunction(value) &&
00085           value.argumentNames().first() == "$super") {
00086         var method = value, value = Object.extend((function(m) {
00087           return function() { return ancestor[m].apply(this, arguments) };
00088         })(property).wrap(method), {
00089           valueOf:  function() { return method },
00090           toString: function() { return method.toString() }
00091         });
00092       }
00093       this.prototype[property] = value;
00094     }
00095 
00096     return this;
00097   }
00098 };

00108 Object.extend(Object, {
00109   inspect: function(object) {
00110     try {
00111       if (Object.isUndefined(object)) return 'undefined';

00113       return object.inspect ? object.inspect() : object.toString();
00114     } catch (e) {
00115       if (e instanceof RangeError) return '...';
00116       throw e;

00120   toJSON: function(object) {
00121     var type = typeof object;
00122     switch (type) {
00123       case 'undefined':
00124       case 'function':
00125       case 'unknown': return;
00126       case 'boolean': return object.toString();
00127     }
00128 
00129     if (object === null) return 'null';
00130     if (object.toJSON) return object.toJSON();
00131     if (Object.isElement(object)) return;
00132 
00133     var results = [];
00134     for (var property in object) {
00135       var value = Object.toJSON(object[property]);
00136       if (!Object.isUndefined(value))
00137         results.push(property.toJSON() + ': ' + value);
00138     }
00139 
00140     return '{' + results.join(', ') + '}';
00141   },

00285 var PeriodicalExecuter = Class.create({
00286   initialize: function(callback, frequency) {
00287     this.callback = callback;
00288     this.frequency = frequency;
00289     this.currentlyExecuting = false;
00290 
00291     this.registerCallback();
00292   },
00293 
00294   registerCallback: function() {
00295     this.timer = setInterval(this.onTimerEvent.bind(this), this.frequency * 1000);
00296   },
00297 
00298   execute: function() {
00299     this.callback(this);
00300   },
00301 
00302   stop: function() {
00303     if (!this.timer) return;
00304     clearInterval(this.timer);
00305     this.timer = null;
00306   },
00307 
00308   onTimerEvent: function() {
00309     if (!this.currentlyExecuting) {
00310       try {
00311         this.currentlyExecuting = true;
00312         this.execute();
00313       } finally {
00314         this.currentlyExecuting = false;
00315       }
00316     }
00317   }

00333 Object.extend(String.prototype, {
00334   gsub: function(pattern, replacement) {
00335     var result = '', source = this, match;
00336     replacement = arguments.callee.prepareReplacement(replacement);
00337 
00338     while (source.length > 0) {
00339       if (match = source.match(pattern)) {
00340         result += source.slice(0, match.index);
00341         result += String.interpret(replacement(match));
00342         source  = source.slice(match.index + match[0].length);
00343       } else {
00344         result += source, source = '';
00345       }
00346     }
00347     return result;
00348   },

00353 
00354     return this.gsub(pattern, function(match) {
00355       if (--count < 0) return match[0];
00356       return replacement(match);
00357     });

00410   toQueryParams: function(separator) {

00412     if (!match) return { };

00422           hash[key].push(value);

00425       }

00551 var Template = Class.create({
00552   initialize: function(template, pattern) {
00553     this.template = template.toString();
00554     this.pattern = pattern || Template.Pattern;
00555   },
00556 
00557   evaluate: function(object) {
00558     if (Object.isFunction(object.toTemplateReplacements))
00559       object = object.toTemplateReplacements();
00560 
00561     return this.template.gsub(this.pattern, function(match) {
00562       if (object == null) return '';
00563 
00564       var before = match[1] || '';
00565       if (before == '\\') return match[2];
00566 
00567       var ctx = object, expr = match[3];
00568       var pattern = /^([^.[]+|\[((?:.*?[^\\])?)\])(\.|\[|$)/;
00569       match = pattern.exec(expr);
00570       if (match == null) return before;
00571 
00572       while (match != null) {
00573         var comp = match[1].startsWith('[') ? match[2].gsub('\\\\]', ']') : match[1];
00574         ctx = ctx[comp];
00575         if (null == ctx || '' == match[3]) break;
00576         expr = expr.substring('[' == match[3] ? match[1].length : match[0].length);
00577         match = pattern.exec(expr);
00578       }
00579 
00580       return before + String.interpret(ctx);
00581     }.bind(this));
00582   }
00583 });

00762   sortBy: function(iterator, context) {

00765       return {value: value, criteria: iterator(value, index)};
00766     }).sort(function(left, right) {
00767       var a = left.criteria, b = right.criteria;
00768       return a < b ? -1 : a > b ? 1 : 0;
00769     }).pluck('value');

00987 var Hash = Class.create(Enumerable, (function() {
00988 
00989   function toQueryPair(key, value) {
00990     if (Object.isUndefined(value)) return key;
00991     return key + '=' + encodeURIComponent(String.interpret(value));
00992   }
00993 
00994   return {
00995     initialize: function(object) {
00996       this._object = Object.isHash(object) ? object.toObject() : Object.clone(object);
00997     },
00998 
00999     _each: function(iterator) {
01000       for (var key in this._object) {
01001         var value = this._object[key], pair = [key, value];
01002         pair.key = key;
01003         pair.value = value;
01004         iterator(pair);
01005       }
01006     },
01007 
01008     set: function(key, value) {
01009       return this._object[key] = value;
01010     },
01011 
01012     get: function(key) {
01013       return this._object[key];
01014     },
01015 
01016     unset: function(key) {
01017       var value = this._object[key];
01018       delete this._object[key];
01019       return value;
01020     },
01021 
01022     toObject: function() {
01023       return Object.clone(this._object);
01024     },
01025 
01026     keys: function() {
01027       return this.pluck('key');
01028     },
01029 
01030     values: function() {
01031       return this.pluck('value');
01032     },
01033 
01034     index: function(value) {
01035       var match = this.detect(function(pair) {
01036         return pair.value === value;
01037       });
01038       return match && match.key;
01039     },
01040 
01041     merge: function(object) {
01042       return this.clone().update(object);
01043     },
01044 
01045     update: function(object) {
01046       return new Hash(object).inject(this, function(result, pair) {
01047         result.set(pair.key, pair.value);
01048         return result;
01049       });
01050     },
01051 
01052     toQueryString: function() {
01053       return this.map(function(pair) {
01054         var key = encodeURIComponent(pair.key), values = pair.value;
01055 
01056         if (values && typeof values == 'object') {
01057           if (Object.isArray(values))
01058             return values.map(toQueryPair.curry(key)).join('&');
01059         }
01060         return toQueryPair(key, values);
01061       }).join('&');
01062     },
01063 
01064     inspect: function() {
01065       return '#<Hash:{' + this.map(function(pair) {
01066         return pair.map(Object.inspect).join(': ');
01067       }).join(', ') + '}>';
01068     },
01069 
01070     toJSON: function() {
01071       return Object.toJSON(this.toObject());
01072     },
01073 
01074     clone: function() {
01075       return new Hash(this);
01076     }
01077   }
01078 })());

01082 var ObjectRange = Class.create(Enumerable, {
01083   initialize: function(start, end, exclusive) {
01084     this.start = start;
01085     this.end = end;
01086     this.exclusive = exclusive;
01087   },
01088 
01089   _each: function(iterator) {
01090     var value = this.start;
01091     while (this.include(value)) {
01092       iterator(value);
01093       value = value.succ();
01094     }
01095   },
01096 
01097   include: function(value) {
01098     if (value < this.start)
01099       return false;
01100     if (this.exclusive)
01101       return value < this.end;
01102     return value <= this.end;
01103   }
01104 });

01110 var Ajax = {

01113       function() {return new XMLHttpRequest()},
01114       function() {return new ActiveXObject('Msxml2.XMLHTTP')},
01115       function() {return new ActiveXObject('Microsoft.XMLHTTP')}
01116     ) || false;

01122 Ajax.Responders = {
01123   responders: [],
01124 
01125   _each: function(iterator) {
01126     this.responders._each(iterator);
01127   },
01128 
01129   register: function(responder) {
01130     if (!this.include(responder))
01131       this.responders.push(responder);
01132   },
01133 
01134   unregister: function(responder) {
01135     this.responders = this.responders.without(responder);
01136   },
01137 
01138   dispatch: function(callback, request, transport, json) {
01139     this.each(function(responder) {
01140       if (Object.isFunction(responder[callback])) {
01141         try {
01142           responder[callback].apply(responder, [request, transport, json]);
01143         } catch (e) { }
01144       }
01145     });
01146   }
01147 };

01156 Ajax.Base = Class.create({
01157   initialize: function(options) {
01158     this.options = {
01159       method:       'post',
01160       asynchronous: true,
01161       contentType:  'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
01162       encoding:     'UTF-8',
01163       parameters:   '',
01164       evalJSON:     true,
01165       evalJS:       true
01166     };
01167     Object.extend(this.options, options || { });
01168 
01169     this.options.method = this.options.method.toLowerCase();
01170 
01171     if (Object.isString(this.options.parameters))
01172       this.options.parameters = this.options.parameters.toQueryParams();
01173     else if (Object.isHash(this.options.parameters))
01174       this.options.parameters = this.options.parameters.toObject();
01175   }
01176 });

01178 Ajax.Request = Class.create(Ajax.Base, {
01179   _complete: false,
01180 
01181   initialize: function($super, url, options) {
01182     $super(options);
01183     this.transport = Ajax.getTransport();
01184     this.request(url);
01185   },
01186 
01187   request: function(url) {
01188     this.url = url;
01189     this.method = this.options.method;
01190     var params = Object.clone(this.options.parameters);
01191 
01192     if (!['get', 'post'].include(this.method)) {
01193       // simulate other verbs over post
01194       params['_method'] = this.method;
01195       this.method = 'post';
01196     }
01197 
01198     this.parameters = params;
01199 
01200     if (params = Object.toQueryString(params)) {
01201       // when GET, append parameters to URL
01202       if (this.method == 'get')
01203         this.url += (this.url.include('?') ? '&' : '?') + params;
01204       else if (/Konqueror|Safari|KHTML/.test(navigator.userAgent))
01205         params += '&_=';
01206     }
01207 
01208     try {
01209       var response = new Ajax.Response(this);
01210       if (this.options.onCreate) this.options.onCreate(response);
01211       Ajax.Responders.dispatch('onCreate', this, response);
01212 
01213       this.transport.open(this.method.toUpperCase(), this.url,
01214         this.options.asynchronous);
01215 
01216       if (this.options.asynchronous) this.respondToReadyState.bind(this).defer(1);
01217 
01218       this.transport.onreadystatechange = this.onStateChange.bind(this);
01219       this.setRequestHeaders();
01220 
01221       this.body = this.method == 'post' ? (this.options.postBody || params) : null;
01222       this.transport.send(this.body);
01223 
01224       /* Force Firefox to handle ready state 4 for synchronous requests */
01225       if (!this.options.asynchronous && this.transport.overrideMimeType)
01226         this.onStateChange();
01227 
01228     }
01229     catch (e) {
01230       this.dispatchException(e);
01231     }
01232   },
01233 
01234   onStateChange: function() {
01235     var readyState = this.transport.readyState;
01236     if (readyState > 1 && !((readyState == 4) && this._complete))
01237       this.respondToReadyState(this.transport.readyState);
01238   },
01239 
01240   setRequestHeaders: function() {
01241     var headers = {
01242       'X-Requested-With': 'XMLHttpRequest',
01243       'X-Prototype-Version': Prototype.Version,
01244       'Accept': 'text/javascript, text/html, application/xml, text/xml, */*'
01245     };
01246 
01247     if (this.method == 'post') {
01248       headers['Content-type'] = this.options.contentType +
01249         (this.options.encoding ? '; charset=' + this.options.encoding : '');
01250 
01251       /* Force "Connection: close" for older Mozilla browsers to work
01252        * around a bug where XMLHttpRequest sends an incorrect
01253        * Content-length header. See Mozilla Bugzilla #246651.
01254        */
01255       if (this.transport.overrideMimeType &&
01256           (navigator.userAgent.match(/Gecko\/(\d{4})/) || [0,2005])[1] < 2005)
01257             headers['Connection'] = 'close';
01258     }
01259 
01260     // user-defined headers
01261     if (typeof this.options.requestHeaders == 'object') {
01262       var extras = this.options.requestHeaders;
01263 
01264       if (Object.isFunction(extras.push))
01265         for (var i = 0, length = extras.length; i < length; i += 2)
01266           headers[extras[i]] = extras[i+1];
01267       else
01268         $H(extras).each(function(pair) { headers[pair.key] = pair.value });
01269     }
01270 
01271     for (var name in headers)
01272       this.transport.setRequestHeader(name, headers[name]);
01273   },
01274 
01275   success: function() {
01276     var status = this.getStatus();
01277     return !status || (status >= 200 && status < 300);
01278   },
01279 
01280   getStatus: function() {
01281     try {
01282       return this.transport.status || 0;
01283     } catch (e) { return 0 }
01284   },
01285 
01286   respondToReadyState: function(readyState) {
01287     var state = Ajax.Request.Events[readyState], response = new Ajax.Response(this);
01288 
01289     if (state == 'Complete') {
01290       try {
01291         this._complete = true;
01292         (this.options['on' + response.status]
01293          || this.options['on' + (this.success() ? 'Success' : 'Failure')]
01294          || Prototype.emptyFunction)(response, response.headerJSON);
01295       } catch (e) {
01296         this.dispatchException(e);
01297       }
01298 
01299       var contentType = response.getHeader('Content-type');
01300       if (this.options.evalJS == 'force'
01301           || (this.options.evalJS && contentType
01302           && contentType.match(/^\s*(text|application)\/(x-)?(java|ecma)script(;.*)?\s*$/i)))
01303         this.evalResponse();
01304     }
01305 
01306     try {
01307       (this.options['on' + state] || Prototype.emptyFunction)(response, response.headerJSON);
01308       Ajax.Responders.dispatch('on' + state, this, response, response.headerJSON);
01309     } catch (e) {
01310       this.dispatchException(e);
01311     }
01312 
01313     if (state == 'Complete') {
01314       // avoid memory leak in MSIE: clean up
01315       this.transport.onreadystatechange = Prototype.emptyFunction;
01316     }
01317   },
01318 
01319   getHeader: function(name) {
01320     try {
01321       return this.transport.getResponseHeader(name) || null;
01322     } catch (e) { return null }
01323   },
01324 
01325   evalResponse: function() {
01326     try {
01327       return eval((this.transport.responseText || '').unfilterJSON());
01328     } catch (e) {
01329       this.dispatchException(e);
01330     }
01331   },
01332 
01333   dispatchException: function(exception) {
01334     (this.options.onException || Prototype.emptyFunction)(this, exception);
01335     Ajax.Responders.dispatch('onException', this, exception);
01336   }
01337 });

01339 Ajax.Request.Events =
01340   ['Uninitialized', 'Loading', 'Loaded', 'Interactive', 'Complete'];

01342 Ajax.Response = Class.create({
01343   initialize: function(request){
01344     this.request = request;
01345     var transport  = this.transport  = request.transport,
01346         readyState = this.readyState = transport.readyState;
01347 
01348     if((readyState > 2 && !Prototype.Browser.IE) || readyState == 4) {
01349       this.status       = this.getStatus();
01350       this.statusText   = this.getStatusText();
01351       this.responseText = String.interpret(transport.responseText);
01352       this.headerJSON   = this._getHeaderJSON();
01353     }
01354 
01355     if(readyState == 4) {
01356       var xml = transport.responseXML;
01357       this.responseXML  = Object.isUndefined(xml) ? null : xml;
01358       this.responseJSON = this._getResponseJSON();
01359     }
01360   },
01361 
01362   status:      0,
01363   statusText: '',
01364 
01365   getStatus: Ajax.Request.prototype.getStatus,
01366 
01367   getStatusText: function() {
01368     try {
01369       return this.transport.statusText || '';
01370     } catch (e) { return '' }
01371   },
01372 
01373   getHeader: Ajax.Request.prototype.getHeader,
01374 
01375   getAllHeaders: function() {
01376     try {
01377       return this.getAllResponseHeaders();
01378     } catch (e) { return null }
01379   },
01380 
01381   getResponseHeader: function(name) {
01382     return this.transport.getResponseHeader(name);
01383   },
01384 
01385   getAllResponseHeaders: function() {
01386     return this.transport.getAllResponseHeaders();
01387   },
01388 
01389   _getHeaderJSON: function() {
01390     var json = this.getHeader('X-JSON');
01391     if (!json) return null;
01392     json = decodeURIComponent(escape(json));
01393     try {
01394       return json.evalJSON(this.request.options.sanitizeJSON);
01395     } catch (e) {
01396       this.request.dispatchException(e);
01397     }
01398   },
01399 
01400   _getResponseJSON: function() {
01401     var options = this.request.options;
01402     if (!options.evalJSON || (options.evalJSON != 'force' &&
01403       !(this.getHeader('Content-type') || '').include('application/json')) ||
01404         this.responseText.blank())
01405           return null;
01406     try {
01407       return this.responseText.evalJSON(options.sanitizeJSON);
01408     } catch (e) {
01409       this.request.dispatchException(e);
01410     }
01411   }
01412 });

01414 Ajax.Updater = Class.create(Ajax.Request, {
01415   initialize: function($super, container, url, options) {
01416     this.container = {
01417       success: (container.success || container),
01418       failure: (container.failure || (container.success ? null : container))
01419     };
01420 
01421     options = Object.clone(options);
01422     var onComplete = options.onComplete;
01423     options.onComplete = (function(response, json) {
01424       this.updateContent(response.responseText);
01425       if (Object.isFunction(onComplete)) onComplete(response, json);
01426     }).bind(this);
01427 
01428     $super(url, options);
01429   },
01430 
01431   updateContent: function(responseText) {
01432     var receiver = this.container[this.success() ? 'success' : 'failure'],
01433         options = this.options;
01434 
01435     if (!options.evalScripts) responseText = responseText.stripScripts();
01436 
01437     if (receiver = $(receiver)) {
01438       if (options.insertion) {
01439         if (Object.isString(options.insertion)) {
01440           var insertion = { }; insertion[options.insertion] = responseText;
01441           receiver.insert(insertion);
01442         }
01443         else options.insertion(receiver, responseText);
01444       }
01445       else receiver.update(responseText);
01446     }
01447   }
01448 });
01449 
01450 Ajax.PeriodicalUpdater = Class.create(Ajax.Base, {
01451   initialize: function($super, container, url, options) {
01452     $super(options);
01453     this.onComplete = this.options.onComplete;
01454 
01455     this.frequency = (this.options.frequency || 2);
01456     this.decay = (this.options.decay || 1);
01457 
01458     this.updater = { };
01459     this.container = container;
01460     this.url = url;
01461 
01462     this.start();
01463   },
01464 
01465   start: function() {
01466     this.options.onComplete = this.updateComplete.bind(this);
01467     this.onTimerEvent();
01468   },
01469 
01470   stop: function() {
01471     this.updater.options.onComplete = undefined;
01472     clearTimeout(this.timer);
01473     (this.onComplete || Prototype.emptyFunction).apply(this, arguments);
01474   },
01475 
01476   updateComplete: function(response) {
01477     if (this.options.decay) {
01478       this.decay = (response.responseText == this.lastText ?
01479         this.decay * this.options.decay : 1);
01480 
01481       this.lastText = response.responseText;
01482     }
01483     this.timer = this.onTimerEvent.bind(this).delay(this.decay * this.frequency);
01484   },
01485 
01486   onTimerEvent: function() {
01487     this.updater = new Ajax.Updater(this.container, this.url, this.options);
01488   }
01489 });
01490 function $(element) {
01491   if (arguments.length > 1) {
01492     for (var i = 0, elements = [], length = arguments.length; i < length; i++)
01493       elements.push($(arguments[i]));
01494     return elements;
01495   }
01496   if (Object.isString(element))
01497     element = document.getElementById(element);
01498   return Element.extend(element);
01499 }

01501 if (Prototype.BrowserFeatures.XPath) {
01502   document._getElementsByXPath = function(expression, parentElement) {
01503     var results = [];
01504     var query = document.evaluate(expression, $(parentElement) || document,
01505       null, XPathResult.ORDERED_NODE_SNAPSHOT_TYPE, null);
01506     for (var i = 0, length = query.snapshotLength; i < length; i++)
01507       results.push(Element.extend(query.snapshotItem(i)));
01508     return results;
01509   };
01510 }

01514 if (!window.Node) var Node = { };
01515

01519     ELEMENT_NODE: 1,
01520     ATTRIBUTE_NODE: 2,
01521     TEXT_NODE: 3,
01522     CDATA_SECTION_NODE: 4,
01523     ENTITY_REFERENCE_NODE: 5,
01524     ENTITY_NODE: 6,

01526     COMMENT_NODE: 8,
01527     DOCUMENT_NODE: 9,
01528     DOCUMENT_TYPE_NODE: 10,
01529     DOCUMENT_FRAGMENT_NODE: 11,
01530     NOTATION_NODE: 12

01534 (function() {
01535   var element = this.Element;
01536   this.Element = function(tagName, attributes) {
01537     attributes = attributes || { };
01538     tagName = tagName.toLowerCase();
01539     var cache = Element.cache;
01540     if (Prototype.Browser.IE && attributes.name) {
01541       tagName = '<' + tagName + ' name="' + attributes.name + '">';
01542       delete attributes.name;
01543       return Element.writeAttribute(document.createElement(tagName), attributes);
01544     }
01545     if (!cache[tagName]) cache[tagName] = Element.extend(document.createElement(tagName));
01546     return Element.writeAttribute(cache[tagName].cloneNode(false), attributes);
01547   };
01548   Object.extend(this.Element, element || { });
01549 }).call(window);
01550 
01551 Element.cache = { };
01552 
01553 Element.Methods = {
01554   visible: function(element) {
01555     return $(element).style.display != 'none';
01556   },
01557 
01558   toggle: function(element) {
01559     element = $(element);
01560     Element[Element.visible(element) ? 'hide' : 'show'](element);
01561     return element;
01562   },
01563 
01564   hide: function(element) {
01565     $(element).style.display = 'none';
01566     return element;
01567   },
01568 
01569   show: function(element) {
01570     $(element).style.display = '';
01571     return element;
01572   },
01573 
01574   remove: function(element) {
01575     element = $(element);
01576     element.parentNode.removeChild(element);
01577     return element;
01578   },
01579 
01580   update: function(element, content) {
01581     element = $(element);
01582     if (content && content.toElement) content = content.toElement();
01583     if (Object.isElement(content)) return element.update().insert(content);
01584     content = Object.toHTML(content);
01585     element.innerHTML = content.stripScripts();
01586     content.evalScripts.bind(content).defer();
01587     return element;
01588   },
01589 
01590   replace: function(element, content) {
01591     element = $(element);
01592     if (content && content.toElement) content = content.toElement();
01593     else if (!Object.isElement(content)) {
01594       content = Object.toHTML(content);
01595       var range = element.ownerDocument.createRange();
01596       range.selectNode(element);
01597       content.evalScripts.bind(content).defer();
01598       content = range.createContextualFragment(content.stripScripts());
01599     }
01600     element.parentNode.replaceChild(content, element);
01601     return element;
01602   },
01603 
01604   insert: function(element, insertions) {
01605     element = $(element);
01606 
01607     if (Object.isString(insertions) || Object.isNumber(insertions) ||
01608         Object.isElement(insertions) || (insertions && (insertions.toElement || insertions.toHTML)))
01609           insertions = {bottom:insertions};
01610 
01611     var content, insert, tagName, childNodes;
01612 
01613     for (position in insertions) {
01614       content  = insertions[position];
01615       position = position.toLowerCase();
01616       insert = Element._insertionTranslations[position];
01617 
01618       if (content && content.toElement) content = content.toElement();
01619       if (Object.isElement(content)) {
01620         insert(element, content);
01621         continue;
01622       }
01623 
01624       content = Object.toHTML(content);
01625 
01626       tagName = ((position == 'before' || position == 'after')
01627         ? element.parentNode : element).tagName.toUpperCase();
01628 
01629       childNodes = Element._getContentFromAnonymousElement(tagName, content.stripScripts());
01630 
01631       if (position == 'top' || position == 'after') childNodes.reverse();
01632       childNodes.each(insert.curry(element));
01633 
01634       content.evalScripts.bind(content).defer();
01635     }
01636 
01637     return element;
01638   },
01639 
01640   wrap: function(element, wrapper, attributes) {
01641     element = $(element);
01642     if (Object.isElement(wrapper))
01643       $(wrapper).writeAttribute(attributes || { });
01644     else if (Object.isString(wrapper)) wrapper = new Element(wrapper, attributes);
01645     else wrapper = new Element('div', wrapper);
01646     if (element.parentNode)
01647       element.parentNode.replaceChild(wrapper, element);
01648     wrapper.appendChild(element);
01649     return wrapper;
01650   },
01651 
01652   inspect: function(element) {
01653     element = $(element);
01654     var result = '<' + element.tagName.toLowerCase();
01655     $H({'id': 'id', 'className': 'class'}).each(function(pair) {
01656       var property = pair.first(), attribute = pair.last();
01657       var value = (element[property] || '').toString();
01658       if (value) result += ' ' + attribute + '=' + value.inspect(true);
01659     });
01660     return result + '>';
01661   },
01662 
01663   recursivelyCollect: function(element, property) {
01664     element = $(element);
01665     var elements = [];
01666     while (element = element[property])
01667       if (element.nodeType == 1)
01668         elements.push(Element.extend(element));
01669     return elements;
01670   },
01671 
01672   ancestors: function(element) {
01673     return $(element).recursivelyCollect('parentNode');
01674   },
01675 
01676   descendants: function(element) {
01677     return $(element).getElementsBySelector("*");
01678   },
01679 
01680   firstDescendant: function(element) {
01681     element = $(element).firstChild;
01682     while (element && element.nodeType != 1) element = element.nextSibling;
01683     return $(element);
01684   },
01685 
01686   immediateDescendants: function(element) {
01687     if (!(element = $(element).firstChild)) return [];
01688     while (element && element.nodeType != 1) element = element.nextSibling;
01689     if (element) return [element].concat($(element).nextSiblings());
01690     return [];
01691   },
01692 
01693   previousSiblings: function(element) {
01694     return $(element).recursivelyCollect('previousSibling');
01695   },
01696 
01697   nextSiblings: function(element) {
01698     return $(element).recursivelyCollect('nextSibling');
01699   },
01700 
01701   siblings: function(element) {
01702     element = $(element);
01703     return element.previousSiblings().reverse().concat(element.nextSiblings());
01704   },
01705 
01706   match: function(element, selector) {
01707     if (Object.isString(selector))
01708       selector = new Selector(selector);
01709     return selector.match($(element));
01710   },
01711 
01712   up: function(element, expression, index) {
01713     element = $(element);
01714     if (arguments.length == 1) return $(element.parentNode);
01715     var ancestors = element.ancestors();
01716     return Object.isNumber(expression) ? ancestors[expression] :
01717       Selector.findElement(ancestors, expression, index);
01718   },
01719 
01720   down: function(element, expression, index) {
01721     element = $(element);
01722     if (arguments.length == 1) return element.firstDescendant();
01723     return Object.isNumber(expression) ? element.descendants()[expression] :
01724       element.select(expression)[index || 0];
01725   },
01726 
01727   previous: function(element, expression, index) {
01728     element = $(element);
01729     if (arguments.length == 1) return $(Selector.handlers.previousElementSibling(element));
01730     var previousSiblings = element.previousSiblings();
01731     return Object.isNumber(expression) ? previousSiblings[expression] :
01732       Selector.findElement(previousSiblings, expression, index);
01733   },
01734 
01735   next: function(element, expression, index) {
01736     element = $(element);
01737     if (arguments.length == 1) return $(Selector.handlers.nextElementSibling(element));
01738     var nextSiblings = element.nextSiblings();
01739     return Object.isNumber(expression) ? nextSiblings[expression] :
01740       Selector.findElement(nextSiblings, expression, index);
01741   },
01742 
01743   select: function() {
01744     var args = $A(arguments), element = $(args.shift());
01745     return Selector.findChildElements(element, args);
01746   },
01747 
01748   adjacent: function() {
01749     var args = $A(arguments), element = $(args.shift());
01750     return Selector.findChildElements(element.parentNode, args).without(element);
01751   },
01752 
01753   identify: function(element) {
01754     element = $(element);
01755     var id = element.readAttribute('id'), self = arguments.callee;
01756     if (id) return id;
01757     do { id = 'anonymous_element_' + self.counter++ } while ($(id));
01758     element.writeAttribute('id', id);
01759     return id;
01760   },
01761 
01762   readAttribute: function(element, name) {
01763     element = $(element);
01764     if (Prototype.Browser.IE) {
01765       var t = Element._attributeTranslations.read;
01766       if (t.values[name]) return t.values[name](element, name);
01767       if (t.names[name]) name = t.names[name];
01768       if (name.include(':')) {
01769         return (!element.attributes || !element.attributes[name]) ? null :
01770          element.attributes[name].value;
01771       }
01772     }
01773     return element.getAttribute(name);
01774   },
01775 
01776   writeAttribute: function(element, name, value) {
01777     element = $(element);
01778     var attributes = { }, t = Element._attributeTranslations.write;
01779 
01780     if (typeof name == 'object') attributes = name;
01781     else attributes[name] = Object.isUndefined(value) ? true : value;
01782 
01783     for (var attr in attributes) {
01784       name = t.names[attr] || attr;
01785       value = attributes[attr];
01786       if (t.values[attr]) name = t.values[attr](element, value);
01787       if (value === false || value === null)
01788         element.removeAttribute(name);
01789       else if (value === true)
01790         element.setAttribute(name, name);
01791       else element.setAttribute(name, value);
01792     }
01793     return element;
01794   },
01795 
01796   getHeight: function(element) {
01797     return $(element).getDimensions().height;
01798   },
01799 
01800   getWidth: function(element) {
01801     return $(element).getDimensions().width;
01802   },
01803 
01804   classNames: function(element) {
01805     return new Element.ClassNames(element);
01806   },
01807 
01808   hasClassName: function(element, className) {
01809     if (!(element = $(element))) return;
01810     var elementClassName = element.className;
01811     return (elementClassName.length > 0 && (elementClassName == className ||
01812       new RegExp("(^|\\s)" + className + "(\\s|$)").test(elementClassName)));
01813   },
01814 
01815   addClassName: function(element, className) {
01816     if (!(element = $(element))) return;
01817     if (!element.hasClassName(className))
01818       element.className += (element.className ? ' ' : '') + className;
01819     return element;
01820   },
01821 
01822   removeClassName: function(element, className) {
01823     if (!(element = $(element))) return;
01824     element.className = element.className.replace(
01825       new RegExp("(^|\\s+)" + className + "(\\s+|$)"), ' ').strip();
01826     return element;
01827   },
01828 
01829   toggleClassName: function(element, className) {
01830     if (!(element = $(element))) return;
01831     return element[element.hasClassName(className) ?
01832       'removeClassName' : 'addClassName'](className);
01833   },
01834 
01835   // removes whitespace-only text node children
01836   cleanWhitespace: function(element) {
01837     element = $(element);
01838     var node = element.firstChild;
01839     while (node) {
01840       var nextNode = node.nextSibling;
01841       if (node.nodeType == 3 && !/\S/.test(node.nodeValue))
01842         element.removeChild(node);
01843       node = nextNode;
01844     }
01845     return element;
01846   },
01847 
01848   empty: function(element) {
01849     return $(element).innerHTML.blank();
01850   },
01851 
01852   descendantOf: function(element, ancestor) {
01853     element = $(element), ancestor = $(ancestor);
01854     var originalAncestor = ancestor;
01855 
01856     if (element.compareDocumentPosition)
01857       return (element.compareDocumentPosition(ancestor) & 8) === 8;
01858 
01859     if (element.sourceIndex && !Prototype.Browser.Opera) {
01860       var e = element.sourceIndex, a = ancestor.sourceIndex,
01861        nextAncestor = ancestor.nextSibling;
01862       if (!nextAncestor) {
01863         do { ancestor = ancestor.parentNode; }
01864         while (!(nextAncestor = ancestor.nextSibling) && ancestor.parentNode);
01865       }
01866       if (nextAncestor) return (e > a && e < nextAncestor.sourceIndex);
01867     }
01868 
01869     while (element = element.parentNode)
01870       if (element == originalAncestor) return true;
01871     return false;
01872   },
01873 
01874   scrollTo: function(element) {
01875     element = $(element);
01876     var pos = element.cumulativeOffset();
01877     window.scrollTo(pos[0], pos[1]);
01878     return element;
01879   },
01880 
01881   getStyle: function(element, style) {
01882     element = $(element);
01883     style = style == 'float' ? 'cssFloat' : style.camelize();
01884     var value = element.style[style];
01885     if (!value) {
01886       var css = document.defaultView.getComputedStyle(element, null);
01887       value = css ? css[style] : null;
01888     }
01889     if (style == 'opacity') return value ? parseFloat(value) : 1.0;
01890     return value == 'auto' ? null : value;
01891   },
01892 
01893   getOpacity: function(element) {
01894     return $(element).getStyle('opacity');
01895   },
01896 
01897   setStyle: function(element, styles) {
01898     element = $(element);
01899     var elementStyle = element.style, match;
01900     if (Object.isString(styles)) {
01901       element.style.cssText += ';' + styles;
01902       return styles.include('opacity') ?
01903         element.setOpacity(styles.match(/opacity:\s*(\d?\.?\d*)/)[1]) : element;
01904     }
01905     for (var property in styles)
01906       if (property == 'opacity') element.setOpacity(styles[property]);
01907       else
01908         elementStyle[(property == 'float' || property == 'cssFloat') ?
01909           (Object.isUndefined(elementStyle.styleFloat) ? 'cssFloat' : 'styleFloat') :
01910             property] = styles[property];
01911 
01912     return element;
01913   },
01914 
01915   setOpacity: function(element, value) {
01916     element = $(element);
01917     element.style.opacity = (value == 1 || value === '') ? '' :
01918       (value < 0.00001) ? 0 : value;
01919     return element;
01920   },
01921 
01922   getDimensions: function(element) {
01923     element = $(element);
01924     var display = $(element).getStyle('display');
01925     if (display != 'none' && display != null) // Safari bug
01926       return {width: element.offsetWidth, height: element.offsetHeight};
01927 
01928     // All *Width and *Height properties give 0 on elements with display none,
01929     // so enable the element temporarily
01930     var els = element.style;
01931     var originalVisibility = els.visibility;
01932     var originalPosition = els.position;
01933     var originalDisplay = els.display;
01934     els.visibility = 'hidden';
01935     els.position = 'absolute';
01936     els.display = 'block';
01937     var originalWidth = element.clientWidth;
01938     var originalHeight = element.clientHeight;
01939     els.display = originalDisplay;
01940     els.position = originalPosition;
01941     els.visibility = originalVisibility;
01942     return {width: originalWidth, height: originalHeight};
01943   },
01944 
01945   makePositioned: function(element) {
01946     element = $(element);
01947     var pos = Element.getStyle(element, 'position');
01948     if (pos == 'static' || !pos) {
01949       element._madePositioned = true;
01950       element.style.position = 'relative';
01951       // Opera returns the offset relative to the positioning context, when an
01952       // element is position relative but top and left have not been defined
01953       if (window.opera) {
01954         element.style.top = 0;
01955         element.style.left = 0;
01956       }
01957     }
01958     return element;
01959   },
01960 
01961   undoPositioned: function(element) {
01962     element = $(element);
01963     if (element._madePositioned) {
01964       element._madePositioned = undefined;
01965       element.style.position =
01966         element.style.top =
01967         element.style.left =
01968         element.style.bottom =
01969         element.style.right = '';
01970     }
01971     return element;
01972   },
01973 
01974   makeClipping: function(element) {
01975     element = $(element);
01976     if (element._overflow) return element;
01977     element._overflow = Element.getStyle(element, 'overflow') || 'auto';
01978     if (element._overflow !== 'hidden')
01979       element.style.overflow = 'hidden';
01980     return element;
01981   },
01982 
01983   undoClipping: function(element) {
01984     element = $(element);
01985     if (!element._overflow) return element;
01986     element.style.overflow = element._overflow == 'auto' ? '' : element._overflow;
01987     element._overflow = null;
01988     return element;
01989   },
01990 
01991   cumulativeOffset: function(element) {
01992     var valueT = 0, valueL = 0;
01993     do {
01994       valueT += element.offsetTop  || 0;
01995       valueL += element.offsetLeft || 0;
01996       element = element.offsetParent;
01997     } while (element);
01998     return Element._returnOffset(valueL, valueT);
01999   },
02000 
02001   positionedOffset: function(element) {
02002     var valueT = 0, valueL = 0;
02003     do {
02004       valueT += element.offsetTop  || 0;
02005       valueL += element.offsetLeft || 0;
02006       element = element.offsetParent;
02007       if (element) {
02008         if (element.tagName == 'BODY') break;
02009         var p = Element.getStyle(element, 'position');
02010         if (p == 'relative' || p == 'absolute') break;
02011       }
02012     } while (element);
02013     return Element._returnOffset(valueL, valueT);
02014   },
02015 
02016   absolutize: function(element) {
02017     element = $(element);
02018     if (element.getStyle('position') == 'absolute') return;
02019     // Position.prepare(); // To be done manually by Scripty when it needs it.
02020 
02021     var offsets = element.positionedOffset();
02022     var top     = offsets[1];
02023     var left    = offsets[0];
02024     var width   = element.clientWidth;
02025     var height  = element.clientHeight;
02026 
02027     element._originalLeft   = left - parseFloat(element.style.left  || 0);
02028     element._originalTop    = top  - parseFloat(element.style.top || 0);
02029     element._originalWidth  = element.style.width;
02030     element._originalHeight = element.style.height;
02031 
02032     element.style.position = 'absolute';
02033     element.style.top    = top + 'px';
02034     element.style.left   = left + 'px';
02035     element.style.width  = width + 'px';
02036     element.style.height = height + 'px';
02037     return element;
02038   },
02039 
02040   relativize: function(element) {
02041     element = $(element);
02042     if (element.getStyle('position') == 'relative') return;
02043     // Position.prepare(); // To be done manually by Scripty when it needs it.
02044 
02045     element.style.position = 'relative';
02046     var top  = parseFloat(element.style.top  || 0) - (element._originalTop || 0);
02047     var left = parseFloat(element.style.left || 0) - (element._originalLeft || 0);
02048 
02049     element.style.top    = top + 'px';
02050     element.style.left   = left + 'px';
02051     element.style.height = element._originalHeight;
02052     element.style.width  = element._originalWidth;
02053     return element;
02054   },
02055 
02056   cumulativeScrollOffset: function(element) {
02057     var valueT = 0, valueL = 0;
02058     do {
02059       valueT += element.scrollTop  || 0;
02060       valueL += element.scrollLeft || 0;
02061       element = element.parentNode;
02062     } while (element);
02063     return Element._returnOffset(valueL, valueT);
02064   },
02065 
02066   getOffsetParent: function(element) {
02067     if (element.offsetParent) return $(element.offsetParent);
02068     if (element == document.body) return $(element);
02069 
02070     while ((element = element.parentNode) && element != document.body)
02071       if (Element.getStyle(element, 'position') != 'static')
02072         return $(element);
02073 
02074     return $(document.body);
02075   },
02076 
02077   viewportOffset: function(forElement) {
02078     var valueT = 0, valueL = 0;
02079 
02080     var element = forElement;
02081     do {
02082       valueT += element.offsetTop  || 0;
02083       valueL += element.offsetLeft || 0;
02084 
02085       // Safari fix
02086       if (element.offsetParent == document.body &&
02087         Element.getStyle(element, 'position') == 'absolute') break;
02088 
02089     } while (element = element.offsetParent);
02090 
02091     element = forElement;
02092     do {
02093       if (!Prototype.Browser.Opera || element.tagName == 'BODY') {
02094         valueT -= element.scrollTop  || 0;
02095         valueL -= element.scrollLeft || 0;
02096       }
02097     } while (element = element.parentNode);
02098 
02099     return Element._returnOffset(valueL, valueT);
02100   },
02101 
02102   clonePosition: function(element, source) {
02103     var options = Object.extend({
02104       setLeft:    true,
02105       setTop:     true,
02106       setWidth:   true,
02107       setHeight:  true,
02108       offsetTop:  0,
02109       offsetLeft: 0
02110     }, arguments[2] || { });
02111 
02112     // find page position of source
02113     source = $(source);
02114     var p = source.viewportOffset();
02115 
02116     // find coordinate system to use
02117     element = $(element);
02118     var delta = [0, 0];
02119     var parent = null;
02120     // delta [0,0] will do fine with position: fixed elements,
02121     // position:absolute needs offsetParent deltas
02122     if (Element.getStyle(element, 'position') == 'absolute') {
02123       parent = element.getOffsetParent();
02124       delta = parent.viewportOffset();
02125     }
02126 
02127     // correct by body offsets (fixes Safari)
02128     if (parent == document.body) {
02129       delta[0] -= document.body.offsetLeft;
02130       delta[1] -= document.body.offsetTop;
02131     }
02132 
02133     // set position
02134     if (options.setLeft)   element.style.left  = (p[0] - delta[0] + options.offsetLeft) + 'px';
02135     if (options.setTop)    element.style.top   = (p[1] - delta[1] + options.offsetTop) + 'px';
02136     if (options.setWidth)  element.style.width = source.offsetWidth + 'px';
02137     if (options.setHeight) element.style.height = source.offsetHeight + 'px';
02138     return element;
02139   }
02140 };
02141 
02142 Element.Methods.identify.counter = 1;

02144 Object.extend(Element.Methods, {
02145   getElementsBySelector: Element.Methods.select,
02146   childElements: Element.Methods.immediateDescendants
02147 });

02149 Element._attributeTranslations = {
02150   write: {
02151     names: {
02152       className: 'class',
02153       htmlFor:   'for'
02154     },
02155     values: { }
02156   }
02157 };

02159 if (Prototype.Browser.Opera) {
02160   Element.Methods.getStyle = Element.Methods.getStyle.wrap(
02161     function(proceed, element, style) {
02162       switch (style) {
02163         case 'left': case 'top': case 'right': case 'bottom':
02164           if (proceed(element, 'position') === 'static') return null;
02165         case 'height': case 'width':
02166           // returns '0px' for hidden elements; we want it to return null
02167           if (!Element.visible(element)) return null;
02168 
02169           // returns the border-box dimensions rather than the content-box
02170           // dimensions, so we subtract padding and borders from the value
02171           var dim = parseInt(proceed(element, style), 10);
02172 
02173           if (dim !== element['offset' + style.capitalize()])
02174             return dim + 'px';
02175 
02176           var properties;
02177           if (style === 'height') {
02178             properties = ['border-top-width', 'padding-top',
02179              'padding-bottom', 'border-bottom-width'];
02180           }
02181           else {
02182             properties = ['border-left-width', 'padding-left',
02183              'padding-right', 'border-right-width'];
02184           }
02185           return properties.inject(dim, function(memo, property) {
02186             var val = proceed(element, property);
02187             return val === null ? memo : memo - parseInt(val, 10);
02188           }) + 'px';
02189         default: return proceed(element, style);
02190       }
02191     }
02192   );
02193 
02194   Element.Methods.readAttribute = Element.Methods.readAttribute.wrap(
02195     function(proceed, element, attribute) {
02196       if (attribute === 'title') return element.title;
02197       return proceed(element, attribute);
02198     }
02199   );
02200 }

02202 else if (Prototype.Browser.IE) {
02203   $w('positionedOffset getOffsetParent viewportOffset').each(function(method) {
02204     Element.Methods[method] = Element.Methods[method].wrap(
02205       function(proceed, element) {
02206         element = $(element);
02207         var position = element.getStyle('position');
02208         if (position != 'static') return proceed(element);
02209         element.setStyle({ position: 'relative' });
02210         var value = proceed(element);
02211         element.setStyle({ position: position });
02212         return value;
02213       }
02214     );
02215   });
02216 
02217   Element.Methods.getStyle = function(element, style) {
02218     element = $(element);
02219     style = (style == 'float' || style == 'cssFloat') ? 'styleFloat' : style.camelize();
02220     var value = element.style[style];
02221     if (!value && element.currentStyle) value = element.currentStyle[style];
02222 
02223     if (style == 'opacity') {
02224       if (value = (element.getStyle('filter') || '').match(/alpha\(opacity=(.*)\)/))
02225         if (value[1]) return parseFloat(value[1]) / 100;
02226       return 1.0;
02227     }
02228 
02229     if (value == 'auto') {
02230       if ((style == 'width' || style == 'height') && (element.getStyle('display') != 'none'))
02231         return element['offset' + style.capitalize()] + 'px';
02232       return null;
02233     }
02234     return value;
02235   };
02236 
02237   Element.Methods.setOpacity = function(element, value) {
02238     function stripAlpha(filter){
02239       return filter.replace(/alpha\([^\)]*\)/gi,'');
02240     }
02241     element = $(element);
02242     var currentStyle = element.currentStyle;
02243     if ((currentStyle && !currentStyle.hasLayout) ||
02244       (!currentStyle && element.style.zoom == 'normal'))
02245         element.style.zoom = 1;
02246 
02247     var filter = element.getStyle('filter'), style = element.style;
02248     if (value == 1 || value === '') {
02249       (filter = stripAlpha(filter)) ?
02250         style.filter = filter : style.removeAttribute('filter');
02251       return element;
02252     } else if (value < 0.00001) value = 0;
02253     style.filter = stripAlpha(filter) +
02254       'alpha(opacity=' + (value * 100) + ')';
02255     return element;
02256   };

02267         },

02351 else if (Prototype.Browser.WebKit) {
02352   Element.Methods.setOpacity = function(element, value) {
02353     element = $(element);
02354     element.style.opacity = (value == 1 || value === '') ? '' :
02355       (value < 0.00001) ? 0 : value;
02356 
02357     if (value == 1)
02358       if(element.tagName == 'IMG' && element.width) {
02359         element.width++; element.width--;
02360       } else try {
02361         var n = document.createTextNode(' ');
02362         element.appendChild(n);
02363         element.removeChild(n);
02364       } catch (e) { }
02365 
02366     return element;
02367   };
02368 
02369   // Safari returns margins on body which is incorrect if the child is absolutely
02370   // positioned.  For performance reasons, redefine Element#cumulativeOffset for
02371   // KHTML/WebKit only.
02372   Element.Methods.cumulativeOffset = function(element) {
02373     var valueT = 0, valueL = 0;
02374     do {
02375       valueT += element.offsetTop  || 0;
02376       valueL += element.offsetLeft || 0;
02377       if (element.offsetParent == document.body)
02378         if (Element.getStyle(element, 'position') == 'absolute') break;
02379 
02380       element = element.offsetParent;
02381     } while (element);
02382 
02383     return Element._returnOffset(valueL, valueT);
02384   };
02385 }

02387 if (Prototype.Browser.IE || Prototype.Browser.Opera) {
02388   // IE and Opera are missing .innerHTML support for TABLE-related and SELECT elements
02389   Element.Methods.update = function(element, content) {
02390     element = $(element);
02391 
02392     if (content && content.toElement) content = content.toElement();
02393     if (Object.isElement(content)) return element.update().insert(content);
02394 
02395     content = Object.toHTML(content);
02396     var tagName = element.tagName.toUpperCase();
02397 
02398     if (tagName in Element._insertionTranslations.tags) {
02399       $A(element.childNodes).each(function(node) { element.removeChild(node) });
02400       Element._getContentFromAnonymousElement(tagName, content.stripScripts())
02401         .each(function(node) { element.appendChild(node) });
02402     }
02403     else element.innerHTML = content.stripScripts();
02404 
02405     content.evalScripts.bind(content).defer();
02406     return element;
02407   };
02408 }
02409 
02410 if (document.createElement('div').outerHTML) {
02411   Element.Methods.replace = function(element, content) {
02412     element = $(element);
02413 
02414     if (content && content.toElement) content = content.toElement();
02415     if (Object.isElement(content)) {
02416       element.parentNode.replaceChild(content, element);
02417       return element;
02418     }
02419 
02420     content = Object.toHTML(content);
02421     var parent = element.parentNode, tagName = parent.tagName.toUpperCase();
02422 
02423     if (Element._insertionTranslations.tags[tagName]) {
02424       var nextSibling = element.next();
02425       var fragments = Element._getContentFromAnonymousElement(tagName, content.stripScripts());
02426       parent.removeChild(element);
02427       if (nextSibling)
02428         fragments.each(function(node) { parent.insertBefore(node, nextSibling) });
02429       else
02430         fragments.each(function(node) { parent.appendChild(node) });
02431     }
02432     else element.outerHTML = content.stripScripts();
02433 
02434     content.evalScripts.bind(content).defer();
02435     return element;
02436   };
02437 }
02438 
02439 Element._returnOffset = function(l, t) {
02440   var result = [l, t];
02441   result.left = l;
02442   result.top = t;
02443   return result;
02444 };
02445 
02446 Element._getContentFromAnonymousElement = function(tagName, html) {
02447   var div = new Element('div'), t = Element._insertionTranslations.tags[tagName];
02448   if (t) {
02449     div.innerHTML = t[0] + html + t[1];
02450     t[2].times(function() { div = div.firstChild });
02451   } else div.innerHTML = html;
02452   return $A(div.childNodes);
02453 };
02454 
02455 Element._insertionTranslations = {
02456   before: function(element, node) {
02457     element.parentNode.insertBefore(node, element);
02458   },
02459   top: function(element, node) {
02460     element.insertBefore(node, element.firstChild);
02461   },
02462   bottom: function(element, node) {
02463     element.appendChild(node);
02464   },
02465   after: function(element, node) {
02466     element.parentNode.insertBefore(node, element.nextSibling);
02467   },
02468   tags: {
02469     TABLE:  ['<table>',                '</table>',                   1],
02470     TBODY:  ['<table><tbody>',         '</tbody></table>',           2],
02471     TR:     ['<table><tbody><tr>',     '</tr></tbody></table>',      3],
02472     TD:     ['<table><tbody><tr><td>', '</td></tr></tbody></table>', 4],
02473     SELECT: ['<select>',               '</select>',                  1]
02474   }
02475 };

02498     document.createElement('div').__proto__) {

02504 Element.extend = (function() {
02505   if (Prototype.BrowserFeatures.SpecificElementExtensions)
02506     return Prototype.K;
02507 
02508   var Methods = { }, ByTag = Element.Methods.ByTag;
02509 
02510   var extend = Object.extend(function(element) {
02511     if (!element || element._extendedByPrototype ||
02512         element.nodeType != 1 || element == window) return element;
02513 
02514     var methods = Object.clone(Methods),
02515       tagName = element.tagName, property, value;
02516 
02517     // extend methods for specific tags
02518     if (ByTag[tagName]) Object.extend(methods, ByTag[tagName]);
02519 
02520     for (property in methods) {
02521       value = methods[property];
02522       if (Object.isFunction(value) && !(property in element))
02523         element[property] = value.methodize();
02524     }
02525 
02526     element._extendedByPrototype = Prototype.emptyFunction;
02527     return element;
02528 
02529   }, {
02530     refresh: function() {
02531       // extend methods for all tags (Safari doesn't need this)
02532       if (!Prototype.BrowserFeatures.ElementExtensions) {
02533         Object.extend(Methods, Element.Methods);
02534         Object.extend(Methods, Element.Methods.Simulated);
02535       }
02536     }
02537   });
02538 
02539   extend.refresh();
02540   return extend;
02541 })();

02543 Element.hasAttribute = function(element, attribute) {
02544   if (element.hasAttribute) return element.hasAttribute(attribute);
02545   return Element.Methods.Simulated.hasAttribute(element, attribute);

02548 Element.addMethods = function(methods) {
02549   var F = Prototype.BrowserFeatures, T = Element.Methods.ByTag;
02550 
02551   if (!methods) {
02552     Object.extend(Form, Form.Methods);
02553     Object.extend(Form.Element, Form.Element.Methods);
02554     Object.extend(Element.Methods.ByTag, {
02555       "FORM":     Object.clone(Form.Methods),
02556       "INPUT":    Object.clone(Form.Element.Methods),
02557       "SELECT":   Object.clone(Form.Element.Methods),
02558       "TEXTAREA": Object.clone(Form.Element.Methods)
02559     });
02560   }
02561 
02562   if (arguments.length == 2) {
02563     var tagName = methods;
02564     methods = arguments[1];
02565   }
02566 
02567   if (!tagName) Object.extend(Element.Methods, methods || { });
02568   else {
02569     if (Object.isArray(tagName)) tagName.each(extend);
02570     else extend(tagName);
02571   }
02572 
02573   function extend(tagName) {
02574     tagName = tagName.toUpperCase();
02575     if (!Element.Methods.ByTag[tagName])
02576       Element.Methods.ByTag[tagName] = { };
02577     Object.extend(Element.Methods.ByTag[tagName], methods);
02578   }
02579 
02580   function copy(methods, destination, onlyIfAbsent) {
02581     onlyIfAbsent = onlyIfAbsent || false;
02582     for (var property in methods) {
02583       var value = methods[property];
02584       if (!Object.isFunction(value)) continue;
02585       if (!onlyIfAbsent || !(property in destination))
02586         destination[property] = value.methodize();
02587     }
02588   }
02589 
02590   function findDOMClass(tagName) {
02591     var klass;
02592     var trans = {
02593       "OPTGROUP": "OptGroup", "TEXTAREA": "TextArea", "P": "Paragraph",
02594       "FIELDSET": "FieldSet", "UL": "UList", "OL": "OList", "DL": "DList",
02595       "DIR": "Directory", "H1": "Heading", "H2": "Heading", "H3": "Heading",
02596       "H4": "Heading", "H5": "Heading", "H6": "Heading", "Q": "Quote",
02597       "INS": "Mod", "DEL": "Mod", "A": "Anchor", "IMG": "Image", "CAPTION":
02598       "TableCaption", "COL": "TableCol", "COLGROUP": "TableCol", "THEAD":
02599       "TableSection", "TFOOT": "TableSection", "TBODY": "TableSection", "TR":
02600       "TableRow", "TH": "TableCell", "TD": "TableCell", "FRAMESET":
02601       "FrameSet", "IFRAME": "IFrame"
02602     };
02603     if (trans[tagName]) klass = 'HTML' + trans[tagName] + 'Element';
02604     if (window[klass]) return window[klass];
02605     klass = 'HTML' + tagName + 'Element';
02606     if (window[klass]) return window[klass];
02607     klass = 'HTML' + tagName.capitalize() + 'Element';
02608     if (window[klass]) return window[klass];
02609 
02610     window[klass] = { };
02611     window[klass].prototype = document.createElement(tagName).__proto__;
02612     return window[klass];
02613   }
02614 
02615   if (F.ElementExtensions) {
02616     copy(Element.Methods, HTMLElement.prototype);
02617     copy(Element.Methods.Simulated, HTMLElement.prototype, true);
02618   }
02619 
02620   if (F.SpecificElementExtensions) {
02621     for (var tag in Element.Methods.ByTag) {
02622       var klass = findDOMClass(tag);
02623       if (Object.isUndefined(klass)) continue;
02624       copy(T[tag], klass.prototype);
02625     }
02626   }
02627 
02628   Object.extend(Element, Element.Methods);
02629   delete Element.ByTag;
02630 
02631   if (Element.extend.refresh) Element.extend.refresh();
02632   Element.cache = { };
02633 };
