02635 document.viewport = {
02636   getDimensions: function() {
02637     var dimensions = { };
02638     var B = Prototype.Browser;
02639     $w('width height').each(function(d) {
02640       var D = d.capitalize();
02641       dimensions[d] = (B.WebKit && !document.evaluate) ? self['inner' + D] :
02642         (B.Opera) ? document.body['client' + D] : document.documentElement['client' + D];
02643     });
02644     return dimensions;
02645   },
02646 
02647   getWidth: function() {
02648     return this.getDimensions().width;
02649   },
02650 
02651   getHeight: function() {
02652     return this.getDimensions().height;
02653   },
02654 
02655   getScrollOffsets: function() {
02656     return Element._returnOffset(
02657       window.pageXOffset || document.documentElement.scrollLeft || document.body.scrollLeft,
02658       window.pageYOffset || document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop);
02659   }
02660 };
02661 /* Portions of the Selector class are derived from Jack Slocum’s DomQuery,
02662  * part of YUI-Ext version 0.40, distributed under the terms of an MIT-style
02663  * license.  Please see http://www.yui-ext.com/ for more information. */
02664 
02665 var Selector = Class.create({
02666   initialize: function(expression) {
02667     this.expression = expression.strip();
02668     this.compileMatcher();
02669   },
02670 
02671   shouldUseXPath: function() {
02672     if (!Prototype.BrowserFeatures.XPath) return false;
02673 
02674     var e = this.expression;
02675 
02676     // Safari 3 chokes on :*-of-type and :empty
02677     if (Prototype.Browser.WebKit &&
02678      (e.include("-of-type") || e.include(":empty")))
02679       return false;
02680 
02681     // XPath can't do namespaced attributes, nor can it read
02682     // the "checked" property from DOM nodes
02683     if ((/(\[[\w-]*?:|:checked)/).test(this.expression))
02684       return false;
02685 
02686     return true;
02687   },
02688 
02689   compileMatcher: function() {
02690     if (this.shouldUseXPath())
02691       return this.compileXPathMatcher();
02692 
02693     var e = this.expression, ps = Selector.patterns, h = Selector.handlers,
02694         c = Selector.criteria, le, p, m;
02695 
02696     if (Selector._cache[e]) {
02697       this.matcher = Selector._cache[e];
02698       return;
02699     }
02700 
02701     this.matcher = ["this.matcher = function(root) {",
02702                     "var r = root, h = Selector.handlers, c = false, n;"];
02703 
02704     while (e && le != e && (/\S/).test(e)) {
02705       le = e;
02706       for (var i in ps) {
02707         p = ps[i];
02708         if (m = e.match(p)) {
02709           this.matcher.push(Object.isFunction(c[i]) ? c[i](m) :
02710               new Template(c[i]).evaluate(m));
02711           e = e.replace(m[0], '');
02712           break;
02713         }
02714       }
02715     }
02716 
02717     this.matcher.push("return h.unique(n);\n}");
02718     eval(this.matcher.join('\n'));
02719     Selector._cache[this.expression] = this.matcher;
02720   },
02721 
02722   compileXPathMatcher: function() {
02723     var e = this.expression, ps = Selector.patterns,
02724         x = Selector.xpath, le, m;
02725 
02726     if (Selector._cache[e]) {
02727       this.xpath = Selector._cache[e]; return;
02728     }
02729 
02730     this.matcher = ['.//*'];
02731     while (e && le != e && (/\S/).test(e)) {
02732       le = e;
02733       for (var i in ps) {
02734         if (m = e.match(ps[i])) {
02735           this.matcher.push(Object.isFunction(x[i]) ? x[i](m) :
02736             new Template(x[i]).evaluate(m));
02737           e = e.replace(m[0], '');
02738           break;
02739         }
02740       }
02741     }
02742 
02743     this.xpath = this.matcher.join('');
02744     Selector._cache[this.expression] = this.xpath;
02745   },
02746 
02747   findElements: function(root) {
02748     root = root || document;
02749     if (this.xpath) return document._getElementsByXPath(this.xpath, root);
02750     return this.matcher(root);
02751   },
02752 
02753   match: function(element) {
02754     this.tokens = [];
02755 
02756     var e = this.expression, ps = Selector.patterns, as = Selector.assertions;
02757     var le, p, m;
02758 
02759     while (e && le !== e && (/\S/).test(e)) {
02760       le = e;
02761       for (var i in ps) {
02762         p = ps[i];
02763         if (m = e.match(p)) {
02764           // use the Selector.assertions methods unless the selector
02765           // is too complex.
02766           if (as[i]) {
02767             this.tokens.push([i, Object.clone(m)]);
02768             e = e.replace(m[0], '');
02769           } else {
02770             // reluctantly do a document-wide search
02771             // and look for a match in the array
02772             return this.findElements(document).include(element);
02773           }
02774         }
02775       }
02776     }
02777 
02778     var match = true, name, matches;
02779     for (var i = 0, token; token = this.tokens[i]; i++) {
02780       name = token[0], matches = token[1];
02781       if (!Selector.assertions[name](element, matches)) {
02782         match = false; break;
02783       }
02784     }
02785 
02786     return match;
02787   },
02788 
02789   toString: function() {
02790     return this.expression;
02791   },
02792 
02793   inspect: function() {
02794     return "#<Selector:" + this.expression.inspect() + ">";
02795   }
02796 });
02797 
02798 Object.extend(Selector, {
02799   _cache: { },
02800 
02801   xpath: {
02802     descendant:   "//*",
02803     child:        "/*",
02804     adjacent:     "/following-sibling::*[1]",
02805     laterSibling: '/following-sibling::*',
02806     tagName:      function(m) {
02807       if (m[1] == '*') return '';
02808       return "[local-name()='" + m[1].toLowerCase() +
02809              "' or local-name()='" + m[1].toUpperCase() + "']";
02810     },
02811     className:    "[contains(concat(' ', @class, ' '), ' #{1} ')]",
02812     id:           "[@id='#{1}']",
02813     attrPresence: function(m) {
02814       m[1] = m[1].toLowerCase();
02815       return new Template("[@#{1}]").evaluate(m);
02816     },
02817     attr: function(m) {
02818       m[1] = m[1].toLowerCase();
02819       m[3] = m[5] || m[6];
02820       return new Template(Selector.xpath.operators[m[2]]).evaluate(m);
02821     },
02822     pseudo: function(m) {
02823       var h = Selector.xpath.pseudos[m[1]];
02824       if (!h) return '';
02825       if (Object.isFunction(h)) return h(m);
02826       return new Template(Selector.xpath.pseudos[m[1]]).evaluate(m);
02827     },
02828     operators: {
02829       '=':  "[@#{1}='#{3}']",
02830       '!=': "[@#{1}!='#{3}']",
02831       '^=': "[starts-with(@#{1}, '#{3}')]",
02832       '$=': "[substring(@#{1}, (string-length(@#{1}) - string-length('#{3}') + 1))='#{3}']",
02833       '*=': "[contains(@#{1}, '#{3}')]",
02834       '~=': "[contains(concat(' ', @#{1}, ' '), ' #{3} ')]",
02835       '|=': "[contains(concat('-', @#{1}, '-'), '-#{3}-')]"
02836     },
02837     pseudos: {
02838       'first-child': '[not(preceding-sibling::*)]',
02839       'last-child':  '[not(following-sibling::*)]',
02840       'only-child':  '[not(preceding-sibling::* or following-sibling::*)]',
02841       'empty':       "[count(*) = 0 and (count(text()) = 0 or translate(text(), ' \t\r\n', '') = '')]",
02842       'checked':     "[@checked]",
02843       'disabled':    "[@disabled]",
02844       'enabled':     "[not(@disabled)]",
02845       'not': function(m) {
02846         var e = m[6], p = Selector.patterns,
02847             x = Selector.xpath, le, v;
02848 
02849         var exclusion = [];
02850         while (e && le != e && (/\S/).test(e)) {
02851           le = e;
02852           for (var i in p) {
02853             if (m = e.match(p[i])) {
02854               v = Object.isFunction(x[i]) ? x[i](m) : new Template(x[i]).evaluate(m);
02855               exclusion.push("(" + v.substring(1, v.length - 1) + ")");
02856               e = e.replace(m[0], '');
02857               break;
02858             }
02859           }
02860         }
02861         return "[not(" + exclusion.join(" and ") + ")]";
02862       },
02863       'nth-child':      function(m) {
02864         return Selector.xpath.pseudos.nth("(count(./preceding-sibling::*) + 1) ", m);
02865       },
02866       'nth-last-child': function(m) {
02867         return Selector.xpath.pseudos.nth("(count(./following-sibling::*) + 1) ", m);
02868       },
02869       'nth-of-type':    function(m) {
02870         return Selector.xpath.pseudos.nth("position() ", m);
02871       },
02872       'nth-last-of-type': function(m) {
02873         return Selector.xpath.pseudos.nth("(last() + 1 - position()) ", m);
02874       },
02875       'first-of-type':  function(m) {
02876         m[6] = "1"; return Selector.xpath.pseudos['nth-of-type'](m);
02877       },
02878       'last-of-type':   function(m) {
02879         m[6] = "1"; return Selector.xpath.pseudos['nth-last-of-type'](m);
02880       },
02881       'only-of-type':   function(m) {
02882         var p = Selector.xpath.pseudos; return p['first-of-type'](m) + p['last-of-type'](m);
02883       },
02884       nth: function(fragment, m) {
02885         var mm, formula = m[6], predicate;
02886         if (formula == 'even') formula = '2n+0';
02887         if (formula == 'odd')  formula = '2n+1';
02888         if (mm = formula.match(/^(\d+)$/)) // digit only
02889           return '[' + fragment + "= " + mm[1] + ']';
02890         if (mm = formula.match(/^(-?\d*)?n(([+-])(\d+))?/)) { // an+b
02891           if (mm[1] == "-") mm[1] = -1;
02892           var a = mm[1] ? Number(mm[1]) : 1;
02893           var b = mm[2] ? Number(mm[2]) : 0;
02894           predicate = "[((#{fragment} - #{b}) mod #{a} = 0) and " +
02895           "((#{fragment} - #{b}) div #{a} >= 0)]";
02896           return new Template(predicate).evaluate({
02897             fragment: fragment, a: a, b: b });
02898         }
02899       }
02900     }
02901   },
02902 
02903   criteria: {
02904     tagName:      'n = h.tagName(n, r, "#{1}", c);   c = false;',
02905     className:    'n = h.className(n, r, "#{1}", c); c = false;',
02906     id:           'n = h.id(n, r, "#{1}", c);        c = false;',
02907     attrPresence: 'n = h.attrPresence(n, r, "#{1}"); c = false;',
02908     attr: function(m) {
02909       m[3] = (m[5] || m[6]);
02910       return new Template('n = h.attr(n, r, "#{1}", "#{3}", "#{2}"); c = false;').evaluate(m);
02911     },
02912     pseudo: function(m) {
02913       if (m[6]) m[6] = m[6].replace(/"/g, '\\"');
02914       return new Template('n = h.pseudo(n, "#{1}", "#{6}", r, c); c = false;').evaluate(m);
02915     },
02916     descendant:   'c = "descendant";',
02917     child:        'c = "child";',
02918     adjacent:     'c = "adjacent";',
02919     laterSibling: 'c = "laterSibling";'
02920   },
02921 
02922   patterns: {
02923     // combinators must be listed first
02924     // (and descendant needs to be last combinator)
02925     laterSibling: /^\s*~\s*/,
02926     child:        /^\s*>\s*/,
02927     adjacent:     /^\s*\+\s*/,
02928     descendant:   /^\s/,
02929 
02930     // selectors follow
02931     tagName:      /^\s*(\*|[\w\-]+)(\b|$)?/,
02932     id:           /^#([\w\-\*]+)(\b|$)/,
02933     className:    /^\.([\w\-\*]+)(\b|$)/,
02934     pseudo:
02935 /^:((first|last|nth|nth-last|only)(-child|-of-type)|empty|checked|(en|dis)abled|not)(\((.*?)\))?(\b|$|(?=\s|[:+~>]))/,
02936     attrPresence: /^\[([\w]+)\]/,
02937     attr:         /\[((?:[\w-]*:)?[\w-]+)\s*(?:([!^$*~|]?=)\s*((['"])([^\4]*?)\4|([^'"][^\]]*?)))?\]/
02938   },
02939 
02940   // for Selector.match and Element#match
02941   assertions: {
02942     tagName: function(element, matches) {
02943       return matches[1].toUpperCase() == element.tagName.toUpperCase();
02944     },
02945 
02946     className: function(element, matches) {
02947       return Element.hasClassName(element, matches[1]);
02948     },
02949 
02950     id: function(element, matches) {
02951       return element.id === matches[1];
02952     },
02953 
02954     attrPresence: function(element, matches) {
02955       return Element.hasAttribute(element, matches[1]);
02956     },
02957 
02958     attr: function(element, matches) {
02959       var nodeValue = Element.readAttribute(element, matches[1]);
02960       return Selector.operators[matches[2]](nodeValue, matches[3]);
02961     }
02962   },
02963 
02964   handlers: {
02965     // UTILITY FUNCTIONS
02966     // joins two collections
02967     concat: function(a, b) {
02968       for (var i = 0, node; node = b[i]; i++)
02969         a.push(node);
02970       return a;
02971     },
02972 
02973     // marks an array of nodes for counting
02974     mark: function(nodes) {
02975       for (var i = 0, node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
02976         node._counted = true;
02977       return nodes;
02978     },
02979 
02980     unmark: function(nodes) {
02981       for (var i = 0, node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
02982         node._counted = undefined;
02983       return nodes;
02984     },
02985 
02986     // mark each child node with its position (for nth calls)
02987     // "ofType" flag indicates whether we're indexing for nth-of-type
02988     // rather than nth-child
02989     index: function(parentNode, reverse, ofType) {
02990       parentNode._counted = true;
02991       if (reverse) {
02992         for (var nodes = parentNode.childNodes, i = nodes.length - 1, j = 1; i >= 0; i--) {
02993           var node = nodes[i];
02994           if (node.nodeType == 1 && (!ofType || node._counted)) node.nodeIndex = j++;
02995         }
02996       } else {
02997         for (var i = 0, j = 1, nodes = parentNode.childNodes; node = nodes[i]; i++)
02998           if (node.nodeType == 1 && (!ofType || node._counted)) node.nodeIndex = j++;
02999       }
03000     },
03001 
03002     // filters out duplicates and extends all nodes
03003     unique: function(nodes) {
03004       if (nodes.length == 0) return nodes;
03005       var results = [], n;
03006       for (var i = 0, l = nodes.length; i < l; i++)
03007         if (!(n = nodes[i])._counted) {
03008           n._counted = true;
03009           results.push(Element.extend(n));
03010         }
03011       return Selector.handlers.unmark(results);
03012     },
03013 
03014     // COMBINATOR FUNCTIONS
03015     descendant: function(nodes) {
03016       var h = Selector.handlers;
03017       for (var i = 0, results = [], node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03018         h.concat(results, node.getElementsByTagName('*'));
03019       return results;
03020     },
03021 
03022     child: function(nodes) {
03023       var h = Selector.handlers;
03024       for (var i = 0, results = [], node; node = nodes[i]; i++) {
03025         for (var j = 0, child; child = node.childNodes[j]; j++)
03026           if (child.nodeType == 1 && child.tagName != '!') results.push(child);
03027       }
03028       return results;
03029     },
03030 
03031     adjacent: function(nodes) {
03032       for (var i = 0, results = [], node; node = nodes[i]; i++) {
03033         var next = this.nextElementSibling(node);
03034         if (next) results.push(next);
03035       }
03036       return results;
03037     },
03038 
03039     laterSibling: function(nodes) {
03040       var h = Selector.handlers;
03041       for (var i = 0, results = [], node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03042         h.concat(results, Element.nextSiblings(node));
03043       return results;
03044     },
03045 
03046     nextElementSibling: function(node) {
03047       while (node = node.nextSibling)
03048               if (node.nodeType == 1) return node;
03049       return null;
03050     },
03051 
03052     previousElementSibling: function(node) {
03053       while (node = node.previousSibling)
03054         if (node.nodeType == 1) return node;
03055       return null;
03056     },
03057 
03058     // TOKEN FUNCTIONS
03059     tagName: function(nodes, root, tagName, combinator) {
03060       var uTagName = tagName.toUpperCase();
03061       var results = [], h = Selector.handlers;
03062       if (nodes) {
03063         if (combinator) {
03064           // fastlane for ordinary descendant combinators
03065           if (combinator == "descendant") {
03066             for (var i = 0, node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03067               h.concat(results, node.getElementsByTagName(tagName));
03068             return results;
03069           } else nodes = this[combinator](nodes);
03070           if (tagName == "*") return nodes;
03071         }
03072         for (var i = 0, node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03073           if (node.tagName.toUpperCase() === uTagName) results.push(node);
03074         return results;
03075       } else return root.getElementsByTagName(tagName);
03076     },
03077 
03078     id: function(nodes, root, id, combinator) {
03079       var targetNode = $(id), h = Selector.handlers;
03080       if (!targetNode) return [];
03081       if (!nodes && root == document) return [targetNode];
03082       if (nodes) {
03083         if (combinator) {
03084           if (combinator == 'child') {
03085             for (var i = 0, node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03086               if (targetNode.parentNode == node) return [targetNode];
03087           } else if (combinator == 'descendant') {
03088             for (var i = 0, node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03089               if (Element.descendantOf(targetNode, node)) return [targetNode];
03090           } else if (combinator == 'adjacent') {
03091             for (var i = 0, node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03092               if (Selector.handlers.previousElementSibling(targetNode) == node)
03093                 return [targetNode];
03094           } else nodes = h[combinator](nodes);
03095         }
03096         for (var i = 0, node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03097           if (node == targetNode) return [targetNode];
03098         return [];
03099       }
03100       return (targetNode && Element.descendantOf(targetNode, root)) ? [targetNode] : [];
03101     },
03102 
03103     className: function(nodes, root, className, combinator) {
03104       if (nodes && combinator) nodes = this[combinator](nodes);
03105       return Selector.handlers.byClassName(nodes, root, className);
03106     },
03107 
03108     byClassName: function(nodes, root, className) {
03109       if (!nodes) nodes = Selector.handlers.descendant([root]);
03110       var needle = ' ' + className + ' ';
03111       for (var i = 0, results = [], node, nodeClassName; node = nodes[i]; i++) {
03112         nodeClassName = node.className;
03113         if (nodeClassName.length == 0) continue;
03114         if (nodeClassName == className || (' ' + nodeClassName + ' ').include(needle))
03115           results.push(node);
03116       }
03117       return results;
03118     },
03119 
03120     attrPresence: function(nodes, root, attr) {
03121       if (!nodes) nodes = root.getElementsByTagName("*");
03122       var results = [];
03123       for (var i = 0, node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03124         if (Element.hasAttribute(node, attr)) results.push(node);
03125       return results;
03126     },
03127 
03128     attr: function(nodes, root, attr, value, operator) {
03129       if (!nodes) nodes = root.getElementsByTagName("*");
03130       var handler = Selector.operators[operator], results = [];
03131       for (var i = 0, node; node = nodes[i]; i++) {
03132         var nodeValue = Element.readAttribute(node, attr);
03133         if (nodeValue === null) continue;
03134         if (handler(nodeValue, value)) results.push(node);
03135       }
03136       return results;
03137     },
03138 
03139     pseudo: function(nodes, name, value, root, combinator) {
03140       if (nodes && combinator) nodes = this[combinator](nodes);
03141       if (!nodes) nodes = root.getElementsByTagName("*");
03142       return Selector.pseudos[name](nodes, value, root);
03143     }
03144   },
03145 
03146   pseudos: {
03147     'first-child': function(nodes, value, root) {
03148       for (var i = 0, results = [], node; node = nodes[i]; i++) {
03149         if (Selector.handlers.previousElementSibling(node)) continue;
03150           results.push(node);
03151       }
03152       return results;
03153     },
03154     'last-child': function(nodes, value, root) {
03155       for (var i = 0, results = [], node; node = nodes[i]; i++) {
03156         if (Selector.handlers.nextElementSibling(node)) continue;
03157           results.push(node);
03158       }
03159       return results;
03160     },
03161     'only-child': function(nodes, value, root) {
03162       var h = Selector.handlers;
03163       for (var i = 0, results = [], node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03164         if (!h.previousElementSibling(node) && !h.nextElementSibling(node))
03165           results.push(node);
03166       return results;
03167     },
03168     'nth-child':        function(nodes, formula, root) {
03169       return Selector.pseudos.nth(nodes, formula, root);
03170     },
03171     'nth-last-child':   function(nodes, formula, root) {
03172       return Selector.pseudos.nth(nodes, formula, root, true);
03173     },
03174     'nth-of-type':      function(nodes, formula, root) {
03175       return Selector.pseudos.nth(nodes, formula, root, false, true);
03176     },
03177     'nth-last-of-type': function(nodes, formula, root) {
03178       return Selector.pseudos.nth(nodes, formula, root, true, true);
03179     },
03180     'first-of-type':    function(nodes, formula, root) {
03181       return Selector.pseudos.nth(nodes, "1", root, false, true);
03182     },
03183     'last-of-type':     function(nodes, formula, root) {
03184       return Selector.pseudos.nth(nodes, "1", root, true, true);
03185     },
03186     'only-of-type':     function(nodes, formula, root) {
03187       var p = Selector.pseudos;
03188       return p['last-of-type'](p['first-of-type'](nodes, formula, root), formula, root);
03189     },
03190 
03191     // handles the an+b logic
03192     getIndices: function(a, b, total) {
03193       if (a == 0) return b > 0 ? [b] : [];
03194       return $R(1, total).inject([], function(memo, i) {
03195         if (0 == (i - b) % a && (i - b) / a >= 0) memo.push(i);
03196         return memo;
03197       });
03198     },
03199 
03200     // handles nth(-last)-child, nth(-last)-of-type, and (first|last)-of-type
03201     nth: function(nodes, formula, root, reverse, ofType) {
03202       if (nodes.length == 0) return [];
03203       if (formula == 'even') formula = '2n+0';
03204       if (formula == 'odd')  formula = '2n+1';
03205       var h = Selector.handlers, results = [], indexed = [], m;
03206       h.mark(nodes);
03207       for (var i = 0, node; node = nodes[i]; i++) {
03208         if (!node.parentNode._counted) {
03209           h.index(node.parentNode, reverse, ofType);
03210           indexed.push(node.parentNode);
03211         }
03212       }
03213       if (formula.match(/^\d+$/)) { // just a number
03214         formula = Number(formula);
03215         for (var i = 0, node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03216           if (node.nodeIndex == formula) results.push(node);
03217       } else if (m = formula.match(/^(-?\d*)?n(([+-])(\d+))?/)) { // an+b
03218         if (m[1] == "-") m[1] = -1;
03219         var a = m[1] ? Number(m[1]) : 1;
03220         var b = m[2] ? Number(m[2]) : 0;
03221         var indices = Selector.pseudos.getIndices(a, b, nodes.length);
03222         for (var i = 0, node, l = indices.length; node = nodes[i]; i++) {
03223           for (var j = 0; j < l; j++)
03224             if (node.nodeIndex == indices[j]) results.push(node);
03225         }
03226       }
03227       h.unmark(nodes);
03228       h.unmark(indexed);
03229       return results;
03230     },
03231 
03232     'empty': function(nodes, value, root) {
03233       for (var i = 0, results = [], node; node = nodes[i]; i++) {
03234         // IE treats comments as element nodes
03235         if (node.tagName == '!' || (node.firstChild && !node.innerHTML.match(/^\s*$/))) continue;
03236         results.push(node);
03237       }
03238       return results;
03239     },
03240 
03241     'not': function(nodes, selector, root) {
03242       var h = Selector.handlers, selectorType, m;
03243       var exclusions = new Selector(selector).findElements(root);
03244       h.mark(exclusions);
03245       for (var i = 0, results = [], node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03246         if (!node._counted) results.push(node);
03247       h.unmark(exclusions);
03248       return results;
03249     },
03250 
03251     'enabled': function(nodes, value, root) {
03252       for (var i = 0, results = [], node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03253         if (!node.disabled) results.push(node);
03254       return results;
03255     },
03256 
03257     'disabled': function(nodes, value, root) {
03258       for (var i = 0, results = [], node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03259         if (node.disabled) results.push(node);
03260       return results;
03261     },
03262 
03263     'checked': function(nodes, value, root) {
03264       for (var i = 0, results = [], node; node = nodes[i]; i++)
03265         if (node.checked) results.push(node);
03266       return results;
03267     }
03268   },
03269 
03270   operators: {
03271     '=':  function(nv, v) { return nv == v; },
03272     '!=': function(nv, v) { return nv != v; },
03273     '^=': function(nv, v) { return nv.startsWith(v); },
03274     '$=': function(nv, v) { return nv.endsWith(v); },
03275     '*=': function(nv, v) { return nv.include(v); },
03276     '~=': function(nv, v) { return (' ' + nv + ' ').include(' ' + v + ' '); },
03277     '|=': function(nv, v) { return ('-' + nv.toUpperCase() + '-').include('-' + v.toUpperCase() + '-'); }
03278   },
03279 
03280   matchElements: function(elements, expression) {
03281     var matches = new Selector(expression).findElements(), h = Selector.handlers;
03282     h.mark(matches);
03283     for (var i = 0, results = [], element; element = elements[i]; i++)
03284       if (element._counted) results.push(element);
03285     h.unmark(matches);
03286     return results;
03287   },
03288 
03289   findElement: function(elements, expression, index) {
03290     if (Object.isNumber(expression)) {
03291       index = expression; expression = false;
03292     }
03293     return Selector.matchElements(elements, expression || '*')[index || 0];
03294   },
03295 
03296   findChildElements: function(element, expressions) {
03297     var exprs = expressions.join(',');
03298     expressions = [];
03299     exprs.scan(/(([\w#:.~>+()\s-]+|\*|\[.*?\])+)\s*(,|$)/, function(m) {
03300       expressions.push(m[1].strip());
03301     });
03302     var results = [], h = Selector.handlers;
03303     for (var i = 0, l = expressions.length, selector; i < l; i++) {
03304       selector = new Selector(expressions[i].strip());
03305       h.concat(results, selector.findElements(element));
03306     }
03307     return (l > 1) ? h.unique(results) : results;
03308   }
03309 });
03310 
03311 if (Prototype.Browser.IE) {
03312   // IE returns comment nodes on getElementsByTagName("*").
03313   // Filter them out.
03314   Selector.handlers.concat = function(a, b) {
03315     for (var i = 0, node; node = b[i]; i++)
03316       if (node.tagName !== "!") a.push(node);
03317     return a;
03318   };
03319 }
03320 
03321 function $$() {
03322   return Selector.findChildElements(document, $A(arguments));
03323 }
03324 var Form = {
03325   reset: function(form) {
03326     $(form).reset();
03327     return form;
03328   },
03329 
03330   serializeElements: function(elements, options) {
03331     if (typeof options != 'object') options = { hash: !!options };
03332     else if (Object.isUndefined(options.hash)) options.hash = true;
03333     var key, value, submitted = false, submit = options.submit;
03334 
03335     var data = elements.inject({ }, function(result, element) {
03336       if (!element.disabled && element.name) {
03337         key = element.name; value = $(element).getValue();
03338         if (value != null && (element.type != 'submit' || (!submitted &&
03339             submit !== false && (!submit || key == submit) && (submitted = true)))) {
03340           if (key in result) {
03341             // a key is already present; construct an array of values
03342             if (!Object.isArray(result[key])) result[key] = [result[key]];
03343             result[key].push(value);
03344           }
03345           else result[key] = value;
03346         }
03347       }
03348       return result;
03349     });
03350 
03351     return options.hash ? data : Object.toQueryString(data);
03352   }
03353 };

03355 Form.Methods = {
03356   serialize: function(form, options) {
03357     return Form.serializeElements(Form.getElements(form), options);
03358   },
03359 
03360   getElements: function(form) {
03361     return $A($(form).getElementsByTagName('*')).inject([],
03362       function(elements, child) {
03363         if (Form.Element.Serializers[child.tagName.toLowerCase()])
03364           elements.push(Element.extend(child));
03365         return elements;
03366       }
03367     );
03368   },
03369 
03370   getInputs: function(form, typeName, name) {
03371     form = $(form);
03372     var inputs = form.getElementsByTagName('input');
03373 
03374     if (!typeName && !name) return $A(inputs).map(Element.extend);
03375 
03376     for (var i = 0, matchingInputs = [], length = inputs.length; i < length; i++) {
03377       var input = inputs[i];
03378       if ((typeName && input.type != typeName) || (name && input.name != name))
03379         continue;
03380       matchingInputs.push(Element.extend(input));
03381     }
03382 
03383     return matchingInputs;
03384   },
03385 
03386   disable: function(form) {
03387     form = $(form);
03388     Form.getElements(form).invoke('disable');
03389     return form;
03390   },
03391 
03392   enable: function(form) {
03393     form = $(form);
03394     Form.getElements(form).invoke('enable');
03395     return form;
03396   },
03397 
03398   findFirstElement: function(form) {
03399     var elements = $(form).getElements().findAll(function(element) {
03400       return 'hidden' != element.type && !element.disabled;
03401     });
03402     var firstByIndex = elements.findAll(function(element) {
03403       return element.hasAttribute('tabIndex') && element.tabIndex >= 0;
03404     }).sortBy(function(element) { return element.tabIndex }).first();
03405 
03406     return firstByIndex ? firstByIndex : elements.find(function(element) {
03407       return ['input', 'select', 'textarea'].include(element.tagName.toLowerCase());
03408     });
03409   },
03410 
03411   focusFirstElement: function(form) {
03412     form = $(form);
03413     form.findFirstElement().activate();
03414     return form;
03415   },
03416 
03417   request: function(form, options) {
03418     form = $(form), options = Object.clone(options || { });
03419 
03420     var params = options.parameters, action = form.readAttribute('action') || '';
03421     if (action.blank()) action = window.location.href;
03422     options.parameters = form.serialize(true);
03423 
03424     if (params) {
03425       if (Object.isString(params)) params = params.toQueryParams();
03426       Object.extend(options.parameters, params);
03427     }
03428 
03429     if (form.hasAttribute('method') && !options.method)
03430       options.method = form.method;
03431 
03432     return new Ajax.Request(action, options);
03433   }
03434 };

03450 Form.Element.Methods = {
03451   serialize: function(element) {
03452     element = $(element);
03453     if (!element.disabled && element.name) {
03454       var value = element.getValue();
03455       if (value != undefined) {
03456         var pair = { };
03457         pair[element.name] = value;
03458         return Object.toQueryString(pair);
03459       }
03460     }
03461     return '';
03462   },
03463 
03464   getValue: function(element) {
03465     element = $(element);
03466     var method = element.tagName.toLowerCase();
03467     return Form.Element.Serializers[method](element);
03468   },
03469 
03470   setValue: function(element, value) {
03471     element = $(element);
03472     var method = element.tagName.toLowerCase();
03473     Form.Element.Serializers[method](element, value);
03474     return element;
03475   },
03476 
03477   clear: function(element) {
03478     $(element).value = '';
03479     return element;
03480   },
03481 
03482   present: function(element) {
03483     return $(element).value != '';
03484   },
03485 
03486   activate: function(element) {
03487     element = $(element);
03488     try {
03489       element.focus();
03490       if (element.select && (element.tagName.toLowerCase() != 'input' ||
03491           !['button', 'reset', 'submit'].include(element.type)))
03492         element.select();
03493     } catch (e) { }
03494     return element;
03495   },
03496 
03497   disable: function(element) {
03498     element = $(element);
03499     element.blur();
03500     element.disabled = true;
03501     return element;
03502   },
03503 
03504   enable: function(element) {
03505     element = $(element);
03506     element.disabled = false;
03507     return element;
03508   }
03509 };

03517 
03518 Form.Element.Serializers = {
03519   input: function(element, value) {
03520     switch (element.type.toLowerCase()) {
03521       case 'checkbox':
03522       case 'radio':
03523         return Form.Element.Serializers.inputSelector(element, value);
03524       default:
03525         return Form.Element.Serializers.textarea(element, value);
03526     }
03527   },
03528 
03529   inputSelector: function(element, value) {
03530     if (Object.isUndefined(value)) return element.checked ? element.value : null;
03531     else element.checked = !!value;
03532   },
03533 
03534   textarea: function(element, value) {
03535     if (Object.isUndefined(value)) return element.value;
03536     else element.value = value;
03537   },
03538 
03539   select: function(element, index) {
03540     if (Object.isUndefined(index))
03541       return this[element.type == 'select-one' ?
03542         'selectOne' : 'selectMany'](element);
03543     else {
03544       var opt, value, single = !Object.isArray(index);
03545       for (var i = 0, length = element.length; i < length; i++) {
03546         opt = element.options[i];
03547         value = this.optionValue(opt);
03548         if (single) {
03549           if (value == index) {
03550             opt.selected = true;
03551             return;
03552           }
03553         }
03554         else opt.selected = index.include(value);
03555       }
03556     }
03557   },
03558 
03559   selectOne: function(element) {
03560     var index = element.selectedIndex;
03561     return index >= 0 ? this.optionValue(element.options[index]) : null;
03562   },
03563 
03564   selectMany: function(element) {
03565     var values, length = element.length;
03566     if (!length) return null;
03567 
03568     for (var i = 0, values = []; i < length; i++) {
03569       var opt = element.options[i];
03570       if (opt.selected) values.push(this.optionValue(opt));
03571     }
03572     return values;
03573   },
03574 
03575   optionValue: function(opt) {
03576     // extend element because hasAttribute may not be native
03577     return Element.extend(opt).hasAttribute('value') ? opt.value : opt.text;
03578   }
03579 };

03583 Abstract.TimedObserver = Class.create(PeriodicalExecuter, {
03584   initialize: function($super, element, frequency, callback) {
03585     $super(callback, frequency);
03586     this.element   = $(element);
03587     this.lastValue = this.getValue();
03588   },
03589 
03590   execute: function() {
03591     var value = this.getValue();
03592     if (Object.isString(this.lastValue) && Object.isString(value) ?
03593         this.lastValue != value : String(this.lastValue) != String(value)) {
03594       this.callback(this.element, value);
03595       this.lastValue = value;
03596     }
03597   }
03598 });

03602     return Form.Element.getValue(this.element);
03603   }

03614 Abstract.EventObserver = Class.create({
03615   initialize: function(element, callback) {
03616     this.element  = $(element);
03617     this.callback = callback;
03618 
03619     this.lastValue = this.getValue();
03620     if (this.element.tagName.toLowerCase() == 'form')
03621       this.registerFormCallbacks();
03622     else
03623       this.registerCallback(this.element);
03624   },
03625 
03626   onElementEvent: function() {
03627     var value = this.getValue();
03628     if (this.lastValue != value) {
03629       this.callback(this.element, value);
03630       this.lastValue = value;
03631     }
03632   },
03633 
03634   registerFormCallbacks: function() {
03635     Form.getElements(this.element).each(this.registerCallback, this);
03636   },
03637 
03638   registerCallback: function(element) {
03639     if (element.type) {
03640       switch (element.type.toLowerCase()) {
03641         case 'checkbox':
03642         case 'radio':
03643           Event.observe(element, 'click', this.onElementEvent.bind(this));
03644           break;
03645         default:
03646           Event.observe(element, 'change', this.onElementEvent.bind(this));
03647           break;
03648       }
03649     }
03650   }
03651 });

03676   KEY_HOME:     36,
03677   KEY_END:      35,

03687       case 'mouseover': element = event.fromElement; break;
03688       case 'mouseout':  element = event.toElement;   break;

03695 Event.Methods = (function() {
03696   var isButton;
03697 
03698   if (Prototype.Browser.IE) {
03699     var buttonMap = { 0: 1, 1: 4, 2: 2 };
03700     isButton = function(event, code) {
03701       return event.button == buttonMap[code];
03702     };
03703 
03704   } else if (Prototype.Browser.WebKit) {
03705     isButton = function(event, code) {
03706       switch (code) {
03707         case 0: return event.which == 1 && !event.metaKey;
03708         case 1: return event.which == 1 && event.metaKey;
03709         default: return false;
03710       }
03711     };
03712 
03713   } else {
03714     isButton = function(event, code) {
03715       return event.which ? (event.which === code + 1) : (event.button === code);
03716     };
03717   }
03718 
03719   return {
03720     isLeftClick:   function(event) { return isButton(event, 0) },
03721     isMiddleClick: function(event) { return isButton(event, 1) },
03722     isRightClick:  function(event) { return isButton(event, 2) },
03723 
03724     element: function(event) {
03725       var node = Event.extend(event).target;
03726       return Element.extend(node.nodeType == Node.TEXT_NODE ? node.parentNode : node);
03727     },
03728 
03729     findElement: function(event, expression) {
03730       var element = Event.element(event);
03731       if (!expression) return element;
03732       var elements = [element].concat(element.ancestors());
03733       return Selector.findElement(elements, expression, 0);
03734     },
03735 
03736     pointer: function(event) {
03737       return {
03738         x: event.pageX || (event.clientX +
03739           (document.documentElement.scrollLeft || document.body.scrollLeft)),
03740         y: event.pageY || (event.clientY +
03741           (document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop))
03742       };
03743     },
03744 
03745     pointerX: function(event) { return Event.pointer(event).x },
03746     pointerY: function(event) { return Event.pointer(event).y },
03747 
03748     stop: function(event) {
03749       Event.extend(event);
03750       event.preventDefault();
03751       event.stopPropagation();
03752       event.stopped = true;
03753     }
03754   };
03755 })();
03756 
03757 Event.extend = (function() {
03758   var methods = Object.keys(Event.Methods).inject({ }, function(m, name) {
03759     m[name] = Event.Methods[name].methodize();
03760     return m;
03761   });
03762 
03763   if (Prototype.Browser.IE) {
03764     Object.extend(methods, {
03765       stopPropagation: function() { this.cancelBubble = true },
03766       preventDefault:  function() { this.returnValue = false },
03767       inspect: function() { return "[object Event]" }
03768     });
03769 
03770     return function(event) {
03771       if (!event) return false;
03772       if (event._extendedByPrototype) return event;
03773 
03774       event._extendedByPrototype = Prototype.emptyFunction;
03775       var pointer = Event.pointer(event);
03776       Object.extend(event, {
03777         target: event.srcElement,
03778         relatedTarget: Event.relatedTarget(event),
03779         pageX:  pointer.x,
03780         pageY:  pointer.y
03781       });
03782       return Object.extend(event, methods);
03783     };
03784 
03785   } else {
03786     Event.prototype = Event.prototype || document.createEvent("HTMLEvents").__proto__;
03787     Object.extend(Event.prototype, methods);
03788     return Prototype.K;
03789   }
03790 })();
03791 
03792 Object.extend(Event, (function() {
03793   var cache = Event.cache;
03794 
03795   function getEventID(element) {
03796     if (element._eventID) return element._eventID;
03797     arguments.callee.id = arguments.callee.id || 1;
03798     return element._eventID = ++arguments.callee.id;
03799   }
03800 
03801   function getDOMEventName(eventName) {
03802     if (eventName && eventName.include(':')) return "dataavailable";
03803     return eventName;
03804   }
03805 
03806   function getCacheForID(id) {
03807     return cache[id] = cache[id] || { };
03808   }
03809 
03810   function getWrappersForEventName(id, eventName) {
03811     var c = getCacheForID(id);
03812     return c[eventName] = c[eventName] || [];
03813   }
03814 
03815   function createWrapper(element, eventName, handler) {
03816     var id = getEventID(element);
03817     var c = getWrappersForEventName(id, eventName);
03818     if (c.pluck("handler").include(handler)) return false;
03819 
03820     var wrapper = function(event) {
03821       if (!Event || !Event.extend ||
03822         (event.eventName && event.eventName != eventName))
03823           return false;
03824 
03825       Event.extend(event);
03826       handler.call(element, event);
03827     };
03828 
03829     wrapper.handler = handler;
03830     c.push(wrapper);
03831     return wrapper;
03832   }
03833 
03834   function findWrapper(id, eventName, handler) {
03835     var c = getWrappersForEventName(id, eventName);
03836     return c.find(function(wrapper) { return wrapper.handler == handler });
03837   }
03838 
03839   function destroyWrapper(id, eventName, handler) {
03840     var c = getCacheForID(id);
03841     if (!c[eventName]) return false;
03842     c[eventName] = c[eventName].without(findWrapper(id, eventName, handler));
03843   }
03844 
03845   function destroyCache() {
03846     for (var id in cache)
03847       for (var eventName in cache[id])
03848         cache[id][eventName] = null;
03849   }
03850 
03851   if (window.attachEvent) {
03852     window.attachEvent("onunload", destroyCache);
03853   }
03854 
03855   return {
03856     observe: function(element, eventName, handler) {
03857       element = $(element);
03858       var name = getDOMEventName(eventName);
03859 
03860       var wrapper = createWrapper(element, eventName, handler);
03861       if (!wrapper) return element;
03862 
03863       if (element.addEventListener) {
03864         element.addEventListener(name, wrapper, false);
03865       } else {
03866         element.attachEvent("on" + name, wrapper);
03867       }
03868 
03869       return element;
03870     },
03871 
03872     stopObserving: function(element, eventName, handler) {
03873       element = $(element);
03874       var id = getEventID(element), name = getDOMEventName(eventName);
03875 
03876       if (!handler && eventName) {
03877         getWrappersForEventName(id, eventName).each(function(wrapper) {
03878           element.stopObserving(eventName, wrapper.handler);
03879         });
03880         return element;
03881 
03882       } else if (!eventName) {
03883         Object.keys(getCacheForID(id)).each(function(eventName) {
03884           element.stopObserving(eventName);
03885         });
03886         return element;
03887       }
03888 
03889       var wrapper = findWrapper(id, eventName, handler);
03890       if (!wrapper) return element;
03891 
03892       if (element.removeEventListener) {
03893         element.removeEventListener(name, wrapper, false);
03894       } else {
03895         element.detachEvent("on" + name, wrapper);
03896       }
03897 
03898       destroyWrapper(id, eventName, handler);
03899 
03900       return element;
03901     },
03902 
03903     fire: function(element, eventName, memo) {
03904       element = $(element);
03905       if (element == document && document.createEvent && !element.dispatchEvent)
03906         element = document.documentElement;
03907 
03908       var event;
03909       if (document.createEvent) {
03910         event = document.createEvent("HTMLEvents");
03911         event.initEvent("dataavailable", true, true);
03912       } else {
03913         event = document.createEventObject();
03914         event.eventType = "ondataavailable";
03915       }
03916 
03917       event.eventName = eventName;
03918       event.memo = memo || { };
03919 
03920       if (document.createEvent) {
03921         element.dispatchEvent(event);
03922       } else {
03923         element.fireEvent(event.eventType, event);
03924       }
03925 
03926       return Event.extend(event);
03927     }
03928   };
03929 })());

03931 Object.extend(Event, Event.Methods);

03933 Element.addMethods({
03934   fire:          Event.fire,
03935   observe:       Event.observe,
03936   stopObserving: Event.stopObserving
03937 });

03939 Object.extend(document, {
03940   fire:          Element.Methods.fire.methodize(),
03941   observe:       Element.Methods.observe.methodize(),
03942   stopObserving: Element.Methods.stopObserving.methodize(),
03943   loaded:        false
03944 });

03946 (function() {
03947   /* Support for the DOMContentLoaded event is based on work by Dan Webb,
03948      Matthias Miller, Dean Edwards and John Resig. */
03949 
03950   var timer;
03951 
03952   function fireContentLoadedEvent() {
03953     if (document.loaded) return;
03954     if (timer) window.clearInterval(timer);
03955     document.fire("dom:loaded");
03956     document.loaded = true;
03957   }
03958 
03959   if (document.addEventListener) {
03960     if (Prototype.Browser.WebKit) {
03961       timer = window.setInterval(function() {
03962         if (/loaded|complete/.test(document.readyState))
03963           fireContentLoadedEvent();
03964       }, 0);
03965 
03966       Event.observe(window, "load", fireContentLoadedEvent);
03967 
03968     } else {
03969       document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",
03970         fireContentLoadedEvent, false);
03971     }
03972 
03973   } else {
03974     document.write("<script id=__onDOMContentLoaded defer src=//:><\/script>");
03975     $("__onDOMContentLoaded").onreadystatechange = function() {
03976       if (this.readyState == "complete") {
03977         this.onreadystatechange = null;
03978         fireContentLoadedEvent();
03979       }
03980     };
03981   }
03982 })();

03989 Element.Methods.childOf = Element.Methods.descendantOf;

04009 var $continue = new Error('"throw $continue" is deprecated, use "return" instead');

04011 // This should be moved to script.aculo.us; notice the deprecated methods
04012 // further below, that map to the newer Element methods.
04013 var Position = {
04014   // set to true if needed, warning: firefox performance problems
04015   // NOT neeeded for page scrolling, only if draggable contained in
04016   // scrollable elements
04017   includeScrollOffsets: false,
04018 
04019   // must be called before calling withinIncludingScrolloffset, every time the
04020   // page is scrolled
04021   prepare: function() {
04022     this.deltaX =  window.pageXOffset
04023                 || document.documentElement.scrollLeft
04024                 || document.body.scrollLeft
04025                 || 0;
04026     this.deltaY =  window.pageYOffset
04027                 || document.documentElement.scrollTop
04028                 || document.body.scrollTop
04029                 || 0;
04030   },
04031 
04032   // caches x/y coordinate pair to use with overlap
04033   within: function(element, x, y) {
04034     if (this.includeScrollOffsets)
04035       return this.withinIncludingScrolloffsets(element, x, y);
04036     this.xcomp = x;
04037     this.ycomp = y;
04038     this.offset = Element.cumulativeOffset(element);
04039 
04040     return (y >= this.offset[1] &&
04041             y <  this.offset[1] + element.offsetHeight &&
04042             x >= this.offset[0] &&
04043             x <  this.offset[0] + element.offsetWidth);
04044   },
04045 
04046   withinIncludingScrolloffsets: function(element, x, y) {
04047     var offsetcache = Element.cumulativeScrollOffset(element);
04048 
04049     this.xcomp = x + offsetcache[0] - this.deltaX;
04050     this.ycomp = y + offsetcache[1] - this.deltaY;
04051     this.offset = Element.cumulativeOffset(element);
04052 
04053     return (this.ycomp >= this.offset[1] &&
04054             this.ycomp <  this.offset[1] + element.offsetHeight &&
04055             this.xcomp >= this.offset[0] &&
04056             this.xcomp <  this.offset[0] + element.offsetWidth);
04057   },
04058 
04059   // within must be called directly before
04060   overlap: function(mode, element) {
04061     if (!mode) return 0;
04062     if (mode == 'vertical')
04063       return ((this.offset[1] + element.offsetHeight) - this.ycomp) /
04064         element.offsetHeight;
04065     if (mode == 'horizontal')
04066       return ((this.offset[0] + element.offsetWidth) - this.xcomp) /
04067         element.offsetWidth;
04068   },
04069 
04070   // Deprecation layer -- use newer Element methods now (1.5.2).
04071 
04072   cumulativeOffset: Element.Methods.cumulativeOffset,
04073 
04074   positionedOffset: Element.Methods.positionedOffset,
04075 
04076   absolutize: function(element) {
04077     Position.prepare();
04078     return Element.absolutize(element);
04079   },
04080 
04081   relativize: function(element) {
04082     Position.prepare();
04083     return Element.relativize(element);
04084   },
04085 
04086   realOffset: Element.Methods.cumulativeScrollOffset,
04087 
04088   offsetParent: Element.Methods.getOffsetParent,
04089 
04090   page: Element.Methods.viewportOffset,
04091 
04092   clone: function(source, target, options) {
04093     options = options || { };
04094     return Element.clonePosition(target, source, options);
04095   }
04096 };
04097

04100 if (!document.getElementsByClassName) document.getElementsByClassName = function(instanceMethods){
04101   function iter(name) {
04102     return name.blank() ? null : "[contains(concat(' ', @class, ' '), ' " + name + " ')]";
04103   }
04104 
04105   instanceMethods.getElementsByClassName = Prototype.BrowserFeatures.XPath ?
04106   function(element, className) {
04107     className = className.toString().strip();
04108     var cond = /\s/.test(className) ? $w(className).map(iter).join('') : iter(className);
04109     return cond ? document._getElementsByXPath('.//*' + cond, element) : [];
04110   } : function(element, className) {
04111     className = className.toString().strip();
04112     var elements = [], classNames = (/\s/.test(className) ? $w(className) : null);
04113     if (!classNames && !className) return elements;
04114 
04115     var nodes = $(element).getElementsByTagName('*');
04116     className = ' ' + className + ' ';
04117 
04118     for (var i = 0, child, cn; child = nodes[i]; i++) {
04119       if (child.className && (cn = ' ' + child.className + ' ') && (cn.include(className) ||
04120           (classNames && classNames.all(function(name) {
04121             return !name.toString().blank() && cn.include(' ' + name + ' ');
04122           }))))
04123         elements.push(Element.extend(child));
04124     }
04125     return elements;
04126   };
04127 
04128   return function(className, parentElement) {
04129     return $(parentElement || document.body).getElementsByClassName(className);
04130   };
04131 }(Element.Methods);
04132

04134 
04135 Element.ClassNames = Class.create();
04136 Element.ClassNames.prototype = {
04137   initialize: function(element) {
04138     this.element = $(element);
04139   },
04140 
04141   _each: function(iterator) {
04142     this.element.className.split(/\s+/).select(function(name) {
04143       return name.length > 0;
04144     })._each(iterator);
04145   },
04146 
04147   set: function(className) {
04148     this.element.className = className;
04149   },
04150 
04151   add: function(classNameToAdd) {
04152     if (this.include(classNameToAdd)) return;
04153     this.set($A(this).concat(classNameToAdd).join(' '));
04154   },
04155 
04156   remove: function(classNameToRemove) {
04157     if (!this.include(classNameToRemove)) return;
04158     this.set($A(this).without(classNameToRemove).join(' '));
04159   },
04160 
04161   toString: function() {
04162     return $A(this).join(' ');
04163   }
04164 };
04165 
04166 Object.extend(Element.ClassNames.prototype, Enumerable);
